original: Abhinanda: Kādambarīkathāsāra
analyzed: abhinanda kādambarī kathā sāra

original: śriyaṃ diśantu vaḥ śaurer dvaye tulyaśramāḥ kramāḥ /
analyzed: śriyam diśantu vaḥ śaureḥ dvaye tulya śramāḥ kramāḥ

original: ye cādau goṣpadaṃ paścāt trailokyaṃ krāmyataś ca ye // AKad_1.1 //
analyzed: ye ca ādau goṣpadam paścāt trailokyam krāmyataḥ ca ye

original: sarasāḥ sadalaṅkārāḥ prasādamadhurā giraḥ /
analyzed: sa rasāḥ sat alaṅkārāḥ prasāda madhurāḥ giraḥ

original: kāntās tātajayantasya jayanti jagatīguroḥ // AKad_1.2 //
analyzed: kāntāḥ tāta jayantasya jayanti jagatī guroḥ

original: guṇoddyotanadīpānāṃ satāṃ na param ujjvalam /
analyzed: guṇa uddyotana dīpānām satām na param ujjvalam

original: yāvan malinam apy eṣāṃ karma dṛṣṭeḥ prasādhanam // AKad_1.3 //
analyzed: yāvat malinam api eṣām karma dṛṣṭeḥ prasādhanam

original: guṇaḥ kṛśo 'pi prathate pṛthur apy apacīyate /
analyzed: guṇaḥ kṛśaḥ u pi prathate pṛthuḥ api apacīyate

original: prāpya sādhukhalau candraḥ pakṣāv iva sitāsitau // AKad_1.4 //
analyzed: prāpya sādhu khalau candraḥ pakṣau iva sita asitau

original: śaktināmābhavad gauḍo bhāradvājakule dvijaḥ /
analyzed: śakti nāmā abhavat gauḍaḥ bhāradvāja kule dvijaḥ

original: dārvābhisāram āsādya kṛtadāraparigrahaḥ // AKad_1.5 //
analyzed: dārvābhisāram āsādya kṛta dāra parigrahaḥ

original: tasya mitrābhidhāno 'bhūd ātmajas tejasāṃ nidhiḥ /
analyzed: tasya mitra abhidhānaḥ bhūt ātmajaḥ tejasām nidhiḥ

original: janena doṣoparamaprabuddhenārcitodayaḥ // AKad_1.6 //
analyzed: janena doṣa uparama prabuddhena arcita udayaḥ

original: sa śaktisvāminaṃ putram avāpa śrutaśālinam /
analyzed: sa śaktisvāminam putram avāpa śruta śālinam

original: rājñaḥ karkoṭavaṃśasya muktāpīḍasya mantriṇam // AKad_1.7 //
analyzed: rājñaḥ karkoṭa vaṃśasya muktāpīḍasya mantriṇam

original: kalyāṇasvāmināmāsya yājñavalkya ivābhavat /
analyzed: kalyāṇasvāmi nāmā asya yājñavalkyaḥ iva abhavat

original: tanayaḥ śuddhayogarddhinirdhūtabhavakalmaṣaḥ // AKad_1.8 //
analyzed: tanayaḥ śuddha yoga ṛddhi nirdhūta bhava kalmaṣaḥ

original: agādhahṛdayāt tasmāt parameśvaramaṇḍanam /
analyzed: agādha hṛdayāt tasmāt parameśvara maṇḍanam

original: ajāyata sutaḥ kāntaś candro dugdhodadher iva // AKad_1.9 //
analyzed: ajāyata sutaḥ kāntaḥ candraḥ dugdha udadheḥ iva

original: putraṃ kṛtajanānandaṃ sa jayantam ajījanat /
analyzed: putram kṛta jana ānandam sa jayantam ajījanat

original: āsīt kavitvavaktṛtvaphalā yasya sarasvatī // AKad_1.10 //
analyzed: āsīt kavi tva vaktṛ tva phalā yasya sarasvatī

original: vṛttikāra iti vyaktaṃ dvitīyaṃ nāma bibhrataḥ /
analyzed: vṛtti kāraḥ iti vyaktam dvitīyam nāma bibhrataḥ

original: vedavedāṅgaviduṣaḥ sarvaśāstrārthavādinaḥ // AKad_1.11 //
analyzed: veda vedāṅga viduṣaḥ sarva śāstra artha vādinaḥ

original: jayantanāmnaḥ sudhiyaḥ sādhusāhityatattvavit /
sūnuḥ samudabhūt tasmād abhinanda iti śrutaḥ // AKad_1.12 //
analyzed: sūnuḥ samudabhūt tasmāt abhinandaḥ iti śrutaḥ

original: yugmam
analyzed: yugmam

original: kāvyavistarasaṃdhānakhedālasadhiyaḥ prati /
analyzed: kāvya vistara saṃdhāna kheda alasa dhiyaḥ prati

original: tena kādambarīsindhoḥ kathāmātraṃ samuddhṛtam // AKad_1.13 //
analyzed: tena kādambarī sindhoḥ kathā mātram samuddhṛtam

original: puruhūtapuraspardhivibhavā bhūṣaṇaṃ bhuvaḥ /
analyzed: puruhūta pura spardhi vibhavā bhūṣaṇam bhuvaḥ

original: babhūva vidiśā nāma purī vetravatītaṭe // AKad_1.14 //
analyzed: babhūva vidiśā nāma purī vetravatī taṭe

original: yā puṇyakarmiṇāṃ tejaḥśālināṃ dyaur ivāspadam /
analyzed: yā puṇya karmiṇām tejaḥ śālinām dyauḥ iva āspadam

original: reje ratnagṛhajyotir jālair indrāyudhaprabhaiḥ // AKad_1.15 //
analyzed: reje ratna gṛha jyotiḥ jālaiḥ indrāyudha prabhaiḥ

original: *yugmam*
analyzed: yugmam

original: tasyāṃ nijabhujodyogavijitārātimaṇḍalaḥ /
analyzed: tasyām nija bhuja udyoga vijita arāti maṇḍalaḥ

original: ākhaṇḍala iva śrīmān rājā śūdraka ity abhūt // AKad_1.16 //
analyzed: ākhaṇḍalaḥ iva śrīmān rājā śūdrakaḥ iti abhūt

original: aṣṭānāṃ lokapālānāṃ rūpaṃ bibhrad api prajāḥ /
analyzed: aṣṭānām lokapālānām rūpam bibhrat api prajāḥ

original: śaśvad ānandayaṃs tābhiś candramā ity avedi yaḥ // AKad_1.17 //
analyzed: śaśvat ānandayan tābhiḥ candramāḥ iti avedi yaḥ

original: *yugmam*
analyzed: yugmam

original: sa medinīṃ vinirjitya caturambhodhimekhalām /
analyzed: sa medinīm vinirjitya catur ambhodhi mekhalām

original: sacivārpitatadbhāras tasyām āsta yathāsukham // AKad_1.18 //
analyzed: saciva arpita tad bhāraḥ tasyām āsta yathāsukham

original: tenānudvejitajanair arthadharmāvirodhibhiḥ /
analyzed: tena anudvejita janaiḥ artha dharma avirodhibhiḥ

original: vinodair atyanīyanta nave vayasi vāsarāḥ // AKad_1.19 //
analyzed: vinodaiḥ atyanīyanta nave vayasi vāsarāḥ

original: tasya cānanyalabhyānāṃ sukhānāṃ pāradṛśvanaḥ /
analyzed: tasya ca an anya labhyānām sukhānām pāra dṛśvanaḥ

original: yūno 'pi suratakrīḍāparāṅ mukham abhūn manaḥ // AKad_1.20 //
analyzed: yūnaḥ pi surata krīḍā parāk mukham abhūt manaḥ

original: prayatnenāpi nāvāpi sā yoṣid viṣameṣuṇā /
analyzed: prayatnena api nā avāpi sā yoṣit viṣama iṣuṇā

original: hartuṃ śaśāka yā tasya hṛdayaṃ cakṣur eva vā // AKad_1.21 //
analyzed: hartum śaśāka yā tasya hṛdayam cakṣuḥ eva vā

original: atha bāhyāṅgaṇasthānavartinaṃ taṃ kadācana /
analyzed: atha bāhya aṅgaṇa sthāna vartinam tam kadācana

original: prasṛtya praṇayaprahvā pratīhārī vyajijñapat // AKad_1.22 //
analyzed: prasṛtya praṇaya prahvā pratīhārī vyajijñapat

original: dūrād upāyanīkṛtya śukam āścaryaceṣṭitam /
analyzed: dūrāt upāyanīkṛtya śukam āścarya ceṣṭitam

original: caṇḍāladārikā kācid āgatā darśanārthinī // AKad_1.23 //
analyzed: caṇḍāla dārikā kācid āgatā darśana arthinī

original: śrutvā kṣaṇaṃ parāmṛśya mukham ālokya mantriṇām /
analyzed: śrutvā kṣaṇam parāmṛśya mukham ālokya mantriṇām

original: samādideśa tāṃ rājā ko doṣaḥ praviśatv iti // AKad_1.24 //
analyzed: samādideśa tām rājā kaḥ doṣaḥ praviśatu iti

original: nijena lakṣmaṇā lokasparśaṃ pariharanty atha /
analyzed: nijena lakṣmaṇā loka sparśam pariharanti atha

original: mātaṅgakanyakāvikṣad anujñātā nṛpāṅgaṇam // AKad_1.25 //
analyzed: anujñātā nṛpa aṅgaṇam

original: tayā ca saha hastasthasaśukasvarṇapañjaraḥ /
analyzed: tayā ca saha hasta stha sa śuka svarṇa pañjaraḥ

original: vahann ahiṃsram ākāraṃ caṇḍālasthaviro 'viśat // AKad_1.26 //
analyzed: vahan ahiṃsram ākāram caṇḍāla sthaviraḥ viśat

original: praviśantīṃ tu tāṃ dṛṣṭvā kanyām adbhutadarśanām /
analyzed: praviśantīm tu tām dṛṣṭvā kanyām adbhuta darśanām

original: paraṃ vyasmayata kṣmāpaḥ kṣaṇaṃ caivam acintayat // AKad_1.27 //
analyzed: param vyasmayata kṣmāpaḥ kṣaṇam ca evam acintayat

original: idaṃ rūpam iyaṃ kāntir ime lāvaṇyaśīkarāḥ /
analyzed: idam rūpam iyam kāntiḥ ime lāvaṇya śīkarāḥ

original: martyatām api na prāhurmātaṅgatve tu kā kathā // AKad_1.28 //
analyzed: martya tām api na prāhuḥ mātaṅga tve tu kā kathā

original: tat satyam eva paśyāmi nūnaṃ mātaṅgamāyayā /
analyzed: tat satyam eva paśyāmi nūnam mātaṅga māyayā

original: channeyaṃ devatā kācin martyalokam upāgatā // AKad_1.29 //
analyzed: channā iyam devatā kācid martya lokam upāgatā

original: ityādi cintayantaṃ sā pragalbhavaniteva tam /
analyzed: ityādi cintayantam sā pragalbha vanitā iva tam

original: praṇanāma mahīpālam anākulavilokinī // AKad_1.30 //
analyzed: praṇanāma mahīpālam an ākula vilokinī

original: tataḥ kṣititalanyastajānuḥ praṇatakandharaḥ /
analyzed: tatas kṣiti tala nyasta jānuḥ praṇata kandharaḥ

original: gāḍhobhayakarāsaktapañjaraḥ sthaviro 'bravīt // AKad_31 //
analyzed: gāḍha ubhaya kara āsakta pañjaraḥ sthaviraḥ bravīt

original: vaiśampāyananāmāyaṃ ratnam atyadbhutaṃ śukaḥ /
analyzed: vaiśampāyana nāmā ayam ratnam ati adbhutam śukaḥ

original: ratnānāṃ cāspadaṃ devo dugdhodadhir ivāparaḥ // AKad_1.32 //
analyzed: ratnānām ca āspadam devaḥ dugdha udadhiḥ iva aparaḥ

original: ity ādareṇa naḥ svāmiduhitrāyam upāhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: iti ādareṇa naḥ svāmi duhitrā ayam upāhṛtaḥ

original: prasādaḥ kriyatām asyā vihagaḥ parigṛhyatām // AKad_1.33 //
analyzed: prasādaḥ kriyatām asyāḥ vihagaḥ parigṛhyatām

original: ity uktvā so 'grato rājñaḥ pañjaraṃ maṇikuṭṭime /
analyzed: iti uktvā saḥ gratas rājñaḥ pañjaram maṇi kuṭṭime

original: vinidhāya praṇamyainaṃ sapraśrayam apāsarat // AKad_1.34 //
analyzed: vinidhāya praṇamya enam sa praśrayam apāsarat

original: iṅgitajñā pratīhārī vivṛtadvārasampuṭam /
analyzed: iṅgita jñā pratīhārī vivṛta dvāra sampuṭam

original: akarot pañjaraṃ tasmān niryayau ca vihaṅgamaḥ // AKad_1.35 //
analyzed: akarot pañjaram tasmāt niryayau ca vihaṅgamaḥ

original: utkṣipya dakṣiṇaṃ pādaṃ jayaśabdam udīrya saḥ /
analyzed: utkṣipya dakṣiṇam pādam jaya śabdam udīrya saḥ

original: prayuktavedamantrāśīr imām āryām athāpaṭhat // AKad_1.36 //
analyzed: prayukta veda mantra āśīḥ imām āryām atha apaṭhat

original: stanayugamaśrusnātaṃ samīpataravarti hṛdayaśokāgneḥ /
analyzed: stana yugam aśru snātam samīpatara varti hṛdaya śoka agneḥ

original: carati vimuktāhāraṃ vratam iva bhavato ripustrīṇām // AKad_1.37 //
analyzed: carati vimukta āhāram vratam iva bhavataḥ ripu strīṇām

original: tām ākarṇya mahīpālo vismayotphullalocanaḥ /
analyzed: tām ākarṇya mahīpālaḥ vismaya utphulla locanaḥ

original: kumārapālanāmānaṃ pradhānāmātyam abravīt // AKad_1.38 //
analyzed: kumārapāla nāmānam pradhāna amātyam abravīt

original: dṛṣṭaṃ bhavadbhir āścaryam īdṛśaṃ śrutam eva vā /
analyzed: dṛṣṭam bhavadbhiḥ āścaryam īdṛśam śrutam eva vā

original: tiryaktve 'tiśayaḥ ko 'yaṃ yo manuṣyeṣu durlabhaḥ // AKad_1.39 //
analyzed: tiryaktve tiśayaḥ kaḥ yam yaḥ manuṣyeṣu durlabhaḥ

original: śrutādhyayanasaṃskāro mātaṅgajanasaṃgatiḥ /
analyzed: śruta adhyayana saṃskāraḥ mātaṅga jana saṃgatiḥ

original: mātaṅgeṣu ca kanyeyam ity āścaryaparamparā // AKad_1.40 //
analyzed: mātaṅgeṣu ca kanyā iyam iti āścarya paramparā

original: amātyas tv abhyadhād deva pūrvasaṃskārakāritāḥ /
analyzed: amātyaḥ tu abhyadhāt deva pūrva saṃskāra kāritāḥ

original: bhavanty atiśayāḥ prāyaḥ prāṇināṃ ko 'tra vismayaḥ // AKad_1.41 //
analyzed: bhavanti atiśayāḥ prāyas prāṇinām kaḥ tra vismayaḥ

original: etāni tāni liṅgāni paralokānumāṃ prati /
analyzed: etāni tāni liṅgāni para loka anumām prati

original: tārkikair upapādyante lokāyatanirākṛtau // AKad_1.42 //
analyzed: tārkikaiḥ upapādyante lokāyata nirākṛtau

original: vicitrā vedhasaḥ sṛṣṭirvicitrā karmavāsanā /
analyzed: vicitrā vedhasaḥ sṛṣṭiḥ vicitrā karma vāsanā

original: vicitras tadvipākaś ca vicitraḥ kālaparyayaḥ // AKad_1.43 //
analyzed: vicitraḥ tad vipākaḥ ca vicitraḥ kāla paryayaḥ

original: ityādiśukasambandhikathāvicchedakāraṇam /
analyzed: ityādi śuka sambandhi kathā viccheda kāraṇam

original: udabhūt tāragambhīro madhyāhṇapaṭahadhvaniḥ // AKad_1.44 //
analyzed: udabhūt tāra gambhīraḥ madhyāhṇa paṭaha dhvaniḥ

original: bahiḥ prakalpyatām asyāḥ sukhāyāvasathādikam /
analyzed: bahis prakalpyatām asyāḥ sukhāya āvasatha ādikam

original: ayaṃ cābhyantaraṃ patrarathabhūpaḥ praveśyatām // AKad_1.45 //
analyzed: ayam ca abhyantaram patraratha bhūpaḥ praveśyatām

original: ity ādiśya pratīhārīṃ sabhām aujjhan mahīpatiḥ /
analyzed: iti ādiśya pratīhārīm sabhām aujjhat mahīpatiḥ

original: visasarja ca rājanyacakraṃ sevārtham āgatam // AKad_1.46 //
analyzed: visasarja ca rājanya cakram sevā artham āgatam

original: tataḥ kṛtālpavyāyāmaḥ snātaḥ pūjitadaivataḥ /
analyzed: tatas kṛta alpa vyāyāmaḥ snātaḥ pūjita daivataḥ

original: hutāgniḥ śrutaviprāśīr bhuktvā śayyāgṛhaṃ yayau // AKad_1.47 //
analyzed: huta agniḥ śruta vipra āśīḥ bhuktvā śayyā gṛham yayau

original: tatra paryaṅkam āruhya dhyātvaiva kim api kṣaṇam /
analyzed: tatra paryaṅkam āruhya dhyātvā eva kim api kṣaṇam

original: tam antaḥpuraviśrāntaṃ śukam ānāyayat punaḥ // AKad_1.48 //
analyzed: tam antaḥpura viśrāntam śukam ānāyayat punar

original: taṃ ca kañcukinānītamādau pṛṣṭvā sukhāsikām /
analyzed: tam ca kañcukinā ānītam ādau pṛṣṭvā sukhāsikām

original: papraccha kautukākṣiptas tadvṛttāntam anantaram // AKad_1.49 //
analyzed: papraccha kautuka ākṣiptaḥ tad vṛttāntam anantaram

original: vaiśampāyana ko nu tvaṃ kva jātaḥ kvoṣitaś ciram /
analyzed: vaiśampāyana kaḥ nu tvam kva jātaḥ kva uṣitaḥ ciram

original: kutastyam idam īdṛk te kalāśāstrādikauśalam // AKad_1.50 //
analyzed: kutastyam idam īdṛś te kalā śāstra ādi kauśalam

original: manye jātismaraḥ ko 'pi bhavān bhūmim imāṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: manye jātismaraḥ kaḥ pi bhavān bhūmim imām gataḥ

original: na hy asty atiśayaprāptir iyatī pakṣijātiṣu // AKad_1.51 //
analyzed: na hi asti atiśaya prāptiḥ iyatī pakṣi jātiṣu

original: kena vā bhavato nāma kṛtaṃ viprajanocitam /
analyzed: kena vā bhavataḥ nāma kṛtam vipra jana ucitam

original: īdṛśānyabhidhānāni kuto 'ntyajanaveśmasu // AKad_1.52 //
analyzed: īdṛśāni abhidhānāni kutas ntya jana veśmasu

original: kathaṃ caṇḍālasamparka iha vā katham āgamaḥ /
analyzed: katham caṇḍāla samparkaḥ iha vā katham āgamaḥ

original: iti kārtsnyena vṛttāntam ātmano vaktum arhasi // AKad_1.53 //
analyzed: iti kārtsnyena vṛttāntam ātmanaḥ vaktum arhasi

original: iti pṛṣṭaḥ kṣitīśena bahumānapuraḥsaram /
analyzed: iti pṛṣṭaḥ kṣitīśena bahu māna puraḥsaram

original: kṣaṇaṃ buddhyānusaṃdhāya śuko vaktuṃ pracakrame // AKad_1.54 //
analyzed: kṣaṇam buddhyā anusaṃdhāya śukaḥ vaktum pracakrame

original: deva vindhyāṭavī tāvattava śrutipathaṃ gatā /
analyzed: deva vindhya aṭavī tāvat tava śrutipatham gatā

original: pūrvāparapayorāśivelāsaṃsparśaśālinī // AKad_1.55 //
yadekadeśe kaṇḍūlagaṇḍebhadalitadrume /
analyzed: yad eka deśe kaṇḍūla gaṇḍa ibha dalita drume

original: uṣitau daṇḍakāraṇye sasītau rāmalakṣmaṇau // AKad_1.56 //
analyzed: uṣitau daṇḍaka araṇye sa sītau rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: *yugmam*
analyzed: yugmam

original: yatrāgastyamuner āsīd āśramaḥ śamināṃ mataḥ /
analyzed: yatra agastya muneḥ āsīt āśramaḥ śaminām mataḥ

original: lopāmudrākarākṣiptajalasaṃvardhitadrumaḥ // AKad_1.57 //
analyzed: lopāmudrā kara ākṣipta jala saṃvardhita drumaḥ

original: tasyopakaṇṭhe pampākhyam asti puṇyajalaṃ saraḥ /
analyzed: tasya upakaṇṭhe pampā ākhyam asti puṇya jalam saraḥ

original: sītākaratalollūnaśravaṇābharaṇotpalam // AKad_1.58 //
analyzed: sītā kara tala ullūna śravaṇa ābharaṇa utpalam

original: tasyāsti paścime tīre jīrṇaḥ śālmalipādapaḥ /
analyzed: tasya asti paścime tīre jīrṇaḥ śālmali pādapaḥ

original: ārohapariṇāhābhyāṃ vyāptavyomadigantaraḥ // AKad_1.59 //
analyzed: āroha pariṇāhābhyām vyāpta vyoma diś antaraḥ

original: tasmin kṛtakulāyāni vītabhītīni durgame /
analyzed: tasmin kṛta kulāyāni vīta bhītīni durgame

original: vihaṅgamasahasrāṇi nivasanti nirantaram // AKad_1.60 //
analyzed: vihaṅgama sahasrāṇi nivasanti nirantaram

original: divā tāny abhinirvartya prāṇayātrām itas tataḥ /
analyzed: divā tāni abhinirvartya prāṇayātrām itas tatas

original: tatrāgatya svanīḍeṣu sukhaṃ rātriṣu śerate // AKad_1.61 //
analyzed: tatra āgatya sva nīḍeṣu sukham rātriṣu śerate

original: tatraiva baddhavasatī abhūtāṃ pitarau mama /
analyzed: tatra eva baddha vasatī abhūtām pitarau mama

original: jāto 'ham ekas tanayas tayor vayasi paścime // AKad_1.62 //

original: *yugmam*

original: sukham ekaṃ tu nājñāsīd apatyālokanodbhavam // AKad_2.20 //
analyzed: sukham ekam tu nā ajñāsīt apatya ālokana udbhavam

original: yathā yathāsya kālena vyatīyāya navaṃ vayaḥ /
analyzed: yathā yathā asya kālena vyatīyāya navam vayaḥ

original: nirapatyatayā śoko vardhate sma tathā tathā // AKad_2.21 //
analyzed: nirapatya tayā śokaḥ vardhate sma tathā tathā

original: mukhyabhūtā ca sarvasminn antaḥpurakadambake /
analyzed: mukhya bhūtā ca sarvasmin antaḥpura kadambake

original: rājñī vilāsavatyākhyā tasya prāṇasamābhavat // AKad_2.22 //
analyzed: rājñī vilāsavatī ākhyā tasya prāṇa samā abhavat

original: sā rājamahiṣī gaurīm abhyarcayitum ekadā /

original: devatāyatanaṃ bāhyaṃ yayau bhartur anujñayā // AKad_2.23 //
analyzed: devatāyatanam bāhyam yayau bhartuḥ anujñayā

original: purāṇe vācyamāne 'tha prasaṅgapatitāṃ śrutim /
analyzed: purāṇe vācyamāne tha prasaṅga patitām śrutim

original: aputrasya kuto lokā iti śuśrāva tatra sā // AKad_2.24 //
analyzed: aputrasya kutas lokāḥ iti śuśrāva tatra sā

original: prataptalohasūcīva sā śrutiḥ śravaṇāntaram /
analyzed: pratapta loha sūcī iva sā śrutiḥ śravaṇa antaram

original: viveśa dadatī tasyāḥ parāṃ kām api vedanām // AKad_2.25 //
analyzed: viveśa dadatī tasyāḥ parām kām api vedanām

original: vastrāvṛtamukhī bhūmāvupaviśya ruroda sā // AKad_2.26 //
analyzed: vastra āvṛta mukhī bhūmau upaviśya ruroda sā

original: sakhībhiḥ prārthyamānāpi na svām abhajata sthitim /
analyzed: sakhībhiḥ prārthyamānā api na svām abhajata sthitim

original: nodasthāt kartum āhāraṃ virarāma na rodanāt // AKad_2.27 //
analyzed: na udasthāt kartum āhāram virarāma na rodanāt

original: athopalabhya tatpīḍāv ārtāṃ parijanān nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: athā upalabhya tad pīḍau ārtām parijanān nṛpaḥ

original: praviśyāntaḥpuraṃ prāha svairam enāṃ prasādayan // AKad_2.28 //
analyzed: praviśya antaḥpuram prāha svairam enām prasādayan

original: priye kim idam ārabdhaṃ rudyate kim akāraṇam /
analyzed: priye kim idam ārabdham rudyate kim akāraṇam

original: na tvayā matkṛte manyur anubhūtaḥ kadācana // AKad_2.29 //
analyzed: na tvayā mad kṛte manyuḥ anubhūtaḥ kadācana

original: anyo 'pi manmukhaprekṣī madadhīnātmajīvitaḥ /
analyzed: anyaḥ pi mad mukha prekṣī mad adhīna ātma jīvitaḥ

original: kas tavotpādayen manyuṃ yasmai kupyasi sundari // AKad_2.30 //
analyzed: kaḥ tava utpādayet manyum yasmai kupyasi sundari

original: iti prasādyamānā sā yadā novāca kiñcana /
analyzed: iti prasādyamānā sā yadā nā uvāca kiñcana

original: tadā viditavṛttāntas tatsakhyā nṛpatiḥ kṛtaḥ // AKad_2.31 //
analyzed: tadā vidita vṛttāntaḥ tad sakhyā nṛpatiḥ kṛtaḥ

original: tena vyatikareṇātha so 'pi śokaparāyaṇaḥ /
analyzed: tena vyatikareṇa atha saḥ pi śoka parāyaṇaḥ

original: ruroda vakṣasi nyastasabāṣpadayitāmukhaḥ // AKad_2.32 //
analyzed: ruroda vakṣasi nyasta sa bāṣpa dayitā mukhaḥ

original: ciraṃ ruditvā niḥśabdaṃ svayam unmṛjya locane /

analyzed: jagāda gadgadam rājāḥ mahiṣīm upasāntvayan

original: mamāpi nanv iyaṃ devi cirāt prabhṛti duḥsahā /

analyzed: dunoti hṛdayam cintā niṣpratīkāra roga vat

analyzed: viphalam bata me rājyam viphalāḥ mama sampadaḥ

analyzed: viphalāḥ mama sambhogāḥ viphalam mama jīvitam

original: kuto 'smākam abhavyānām iyatyo bhāgyasampadaḥ /
analyzed: kutas smākam abhavyānām iyatyaḥ bhāgya sampadaḥ

original: yad drakṣyāmas tavotsaṅgaṃ bālakālatyamaṇḍitam // AKad_2.36 //
analyzed: yat drakṣyāmaḥ tava utsaṅgam bāla kālatya maṇḍitam

original: vāñchan krīḍanakaṃ kiñcit kadā me pāpakarmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: vāñchan krīḍanakam kiñcid kadā me pāpa karmaṇaḥ

original: ākṛṣyati sutaḥ kūrcaṃ kim apy avyaktam ālapan // AKad_2.37 //
analyzed: ākṛṣyati sutaḥ kūrcam kim api avyaktam ālapan

original: ityādi vilapaty asmin bāṣpākulitalocane /
analyzed: ityādi vilapati asmin bāṣpa ākulita locane

original: śukanāsa imāṃ vārtāṃ śrutvā satvaramāyayau // AKad_2.38 //
analyzed: śukanāsaḥ imām vārtām śrutvā satvaram āyayau

original: nirapatyaḥ kṛtaḥ so 'pi rājeva hatavedhasā /
analyzed: nirapatyaḥ kṛtaḥ saḥ u pi rājā iva hata vedhasā

original: tasyāpy anena śokena gṛhe roditi gehinī // AKad_2.39 //
analyzed: tasya api anena śokena gṛhe roditi gehinī

original: sa tu svāmigataṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkham ity avadhārayan /
analyzed: sa tu svāmi gatam duḥkham duḥkham iti avadhārayan

original: tadduḥkhāpanayopāyapravaṇo dhīram abhyadhāt // AKad_2.40 //
analyzed: tad duḥkha apanaya upāya pravaṇaḥ dhīram abhyadhāt

original: kva dhīraprakṛtirdevaḥ kveyaṃ vilkavacittatā /
analyzed: kva dhīra prakṛtiḥ devaḥ kva iyam

original: śoko 'vakāśaṃ labhate hṛdaye na bhavādṛśām // AKad_2.41 //
analyzed: śokaḥ vakāśam labhate hṛdaye na bhavādṛśām

original: yadi hi strīsvabhāvena devī viklavatāṃ gatā /
analyzed: yadi hi strī svabhāvena devī viklava tām gatā

original: tat kiṃ pralambakūrcasya yuktaṃ devasya roditum // AKad_2.42 //
analyzed: tat kim pralamba kūrcasya yuktam devasya roditum

original: ko 'yaṃ hitāhitaprāptipārihārakriyākramaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ yam hita ahita prāpti pārihāra kriyā kramaḥ

original: yat kapolatalanyastahastaṃ niḥśvasyate ciram // AKad_2.43 //
analyzed: yat kapola tala nyasta hastam niḥśvasyate ciram

original: yadi duḥkhāsikā satyamanapatyatayā tava /

analyzed: buddhiḥ ādhīyatām dharme dharma utsavam avāpyate

original: dīyatāṃ vasu viprebhyaḥ pūjyantāṃ sarvadevatāḥ /
analyzed: dīyatām vasu viprebhyaḥ pūjyantām sarva devatāḥ

original: pravartyantāṃ prapārāmāḥ khanyantāṃ salilāśayāḥ // AKad_2.45 //
analyzed: pravartyantām prapā ārāmāḥ khanyantām salilāśayāḥ

original: nāsti nāma jagaty asmin puruṣārthaḥ sa kaścana /

original: yo dharmaniratair dhīrais tvādṛśair nādhigamyate // AKad_2.46 //

original: ityādi śukanāsoktam ākarṇya vigatajvarau /

original: utthāya svasthavat sarvā dampatī cakratuḥ kriyāḥ // AKad_2.47 //
analyzed: utthāya svastha vat sarvāḥ dampatī cakratuḥ kriyāḥ

original: tataḥ prabhṛti dānāni yāgahomatapāṃsi tau /

original: citrāṇy akurutāṃ sarvā vyasmayanta tataḥ prajāḥ // AKad_2.48 //
analyzed: citrāṇi akurutām sarvāḥ vyasmayanta tatas prajāḥ

original: kadācid atha bhūpālaḥ svapne 'paśyan niśākaram /
analyzed: kadācid atha bhūpālaḥ svapne paśyan niśākaram

original: vilāsavatyā vadanaṃ praviśantam akhaṇḍitam // AKad_2.49 //
analyzed: vilāsavatyāḥ vadanam praviśantam akhaṇḍitam

analyzed: tathā manoramā nāma śuka nāsasya gehinī

original: svapne sapuṇḍarīkāṅkā sāpi tena vyalokyata // AKad_2.50 //

original: anyedyurudaye bhānormaṅgalācārapūrvakam /

original: taṃ svapnaṃ kathayāmāsa śukanāsāya bhūpatiḥ // AKad_2.51 //
analyzed: tam svapnam kathayāmāsa śukanāsāya bhūpatiḥ

original: sānandaṃ so 'bhyadhād enaṃ sampannās te manorathāḥ /

analyzed: acirāt soṣyate devī putram pūrṇa indu sundaram

analyzed: mahiṣī tad sakhībhyaḥ ca tam ajñāsīt nareśvaraḥ

original: krameṇa garbhaliṅgeṣu vyakteṣu mumudetarām // AKad_2.54 //

analyzed: cakāṅkṣa cātakaḥ meghān iva prasava vāsarān

original: atrāntare mantrigṛhād āgatya dvārarakṣakaḥ /

original: ime te patitāḥ satyaṃ tuhine somaraśmayaḥ // AKad_2.66 //
analyzed: ime te patitāḥ satyam tuhine soma raśmayaḥ

original: sādhv idaṃ vedhasārabdhaṃ cittānuguṇam āvayoḥ /
analyzed: sādhu idam vedhasā ārabdham citta anuguṇam āvayoḥ

original: sahaiva pātratāṃ nītau yad āvāṃ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ // AKad_2.67 //

analyzed: tatas tūrya ravaiḥ nṛtyaiḥ carcarī tāla niḥsvanaiḥ

original: sindūraghanasārādikṣodaiḥ kuṅkumakardamaiḥ // AKad_2.68 //
anapekṣitanīcoccavyavahāranirargalā /
analyzed: an apekṣita nīca ucca vyavahāra nirargalā

original: keliḥ pravavṛte tatra rājagehamahotsave // AKad_2.69 //
analyzed: keliḥ pravavṛte tatra rāja geha mahā utsave

analyzed: śuka nāsagṛham gatvā dviguṇam tam akārayat

original: kṛte 'tha jātakarmādau vṛtte ṣaṣṭhīprajāgare /
analyzed: kṛte jātakarma ādau vṛtte ṣaṣṭhī prajāgare

analyzed: vilāsavatyām snātāyām śucau kāle upasthite

analyzed: snātaḥ suvarṇa lakṣeṇa pūjayitvā dvijottamān

original: sa bhūṣaṇāni vāsāṃsi varṣan parijane śiśoḥ /
analyzed: sa bhūṣaṇāni vāsāṃsi varṣan parijane śiśoḥ

original: candrāpīḍa iti svapnasadṛśaṃ nāma nirmame // AKad_2.73 //
analyzed: candrāpīḍaḥ iti svapna sadṛśam nāma nirmame

original: śukanāso 'pi sampūjya viprān viprajanocitam /
analyzed: sampūjya viprān vipra jana ucitam

original: vaiśampāyana ity ātmasūnor nāma praṇītavān // AKad_2.74 //
analyzed: vaiśampāyanaḥ iti ātma sūnoḥ nāma praṇītavān

original: krameṇa vardhamāno 'tha kṛtacūḍādimaṅgalaḥ /
analyzed: krameṇa kṛta cūḍā ādi maṅgalaḥ

original: candrāpīḍo 'bhavat pitroḥ param utsaṅgamaṇḍanam // AKad_2.75 //
analyzed: candrāpīḍaḥ bhavat pitroḥ param utsaṅga maṇḍanam

original: ākāreṇendukāntena madhurair bālavalgitaiḥ /
analyzed: ākāreṇa indu kāntena madhuraiḥ bāla valgitaiḥ

original: avyaktavarṇair ālāpair aharat sa tayor manaḥ // AKad_2.76 //
analyzed: avyakta varṇaiḥ ālāpaiḥ aharat sa tayoḥ manaḥ

original: candrāpīḍasya nagarādbahirbahuguṇaṃ nṛpaḥ // AKad_2.77 //
analyzed: candrāpīḍasya nagarāt bahis bahuguṇam nṛpaḥ

original: tatra nyaveśayadrājā vidyādhigamasiddhaye // AKad_2.78 //
analyzed: tatra nyaveśayat rājā vidyā adhigama siddhaye

original: tarkavyākaraṇābhijñān dhanurvedaviśāradān /
analyzed: tarka vyākaraṇa abhijñān dhanurveda viśāradān

original: daṇḍanītyādinipuṇān ācāryān paryakalpayat // AKad_2.79 //
analyzed: daṇḍanīti ādi nipuṇān ācāryān paryakalpayat

original: śukanāso 'pi taṃ putram upanīya yathāvidhi /
analyzed: śukanāsaḥ pi tam putram upanīya yathāvidhi

original: rājaputrānugaṃ cakre vidyāgṛhanivāsinam // AKad_2.80 //
analyzed: rāja putra anugam cakre vidyā gṛha nivāsinam

original: nṛpatis tv agamad draṣṭuṃ putraṃ gurukule sthitam /
analyzed: nṛpatiḥ tu agamat draṣṭum putram guru kule sthitam

original: prārthito 'pi sa tanmātrā nainam ānāyayad gṛham // AKad_2.81 //
analyzed: prārthitaḥ u pi sa tad mātrā na enam ānāyayat gṛham

original: pūrṇaṣoḍaśavarṣo 'tha rājaputraḥ kuśāgradhīḥ /
analyzed: rāja putraḥ kuśa agra dhīḥ

original: sakṛdadhyāpito vidyāḥ pūrvābhyastā ivāgrahīt // AKad_2.82 //
analyzed: sakṛt adhyāpitaḥ vidyāḥ pūrva abhyastāḥ iva agrahīt

original: sarvaśāstrārthatattvajñaḥ sarvabhāṣāsu satkaviḥ /
analyzed: sarva śāstra artha tattva jñaḥ sarva bhāṣāsu sat kaviḥ

original: sarvavādeṣu vaktābhūtsarvaśāstreṣu kovidaḥ // AKad_2.83 //
analyzed: sarva vādeṣu vaktā abhūt sarva śāstreṣu kovidaḥ

original: prauḍhaḥ kalāsu sarvāsu dakṣaḥ sarveṣu karmasu /

analyzed: vrajantīm anu vavrāja devatāvat praṇamya tām

analyzed: sthita ajina kuśa alābu pātra daṇḍa kamaṇḍalum

original: tatra darbhāsanāsīnam upaviṣṭā mṛgājine /

analyzed: papraccha candrāpīḍam sā sva rūpa āgamana ādikam

analyzed: gṛhīta bhikṣā pātrā ca kṣaṇam āsta taroḥ adhas

original: āpūryata svayaṃ śīrṇaiḥ phalais tad amṛtopamaiḥ // AKad_3.105 //
analyzed: āpūryata svayam śīrṇaiḥ phalaiḥ tat amṛta upamaiḥ

analyzed: anvatiṣṭhat vacaḥ tasyāḥ sa ca vismayamāna dhīḥ

analyzed: gatvā sā api phala āhāra prakriyā mātram ācarat

analyzed: tārāpīḍa ujjayinī ādi kathayā kṣaṇam āsta sā

analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca asyāḥ praśama madhurām ākṛtim bhāva śuddhim dākṣiṇyam ca prakṛti saralam labdha vākya avakāśaḥ

original: ātmodantaṃ niyatam akhilaṃ vakṣyati prārthiteyaṃ candrāpīḍaḥ kṣaṇam atha kṛtapraśnasampratyayo 'bhūt // AKad_3.110 //

analyzed: tām avocata mādhurya vinaya udārayā girā

analyzed: katham kām api digdanti danta kānti atiśāyinīm

analyzed: iyam api ākṛtiḥ nāma duḥkhaiḥ yat abhibhūyate

original: asau ciraṃ ruditvā tu valkalonmṛṣṭalocanā /
analyzed: asau ciram ruditvā tu valkala unmṛṣṭa locanā

analyzed: dīrgham uṣṇam ca niḥśvasya vyāhartum upacakrame

original: rājaputra kim etena śokaikavasater mama /

analyzed: pāpāyāḥ mandabhāgyāyāḥ vṛttāntena śrutena te

original: tathāpi yadi te cittaṃ kutūhalavaśīkṛtam /

dakṣakanyodbhavaṃ teṣu gandharvāṇāṃ kuladvayam /
analyzed: dakṣa kanyā udbhavam teṣu gandharvāṇām kula dvayam

analyzed: saṃcarantī sva bandhūnām aṅkāt aṅkam aharniśam

atyavāhayamakleśapeśalasthiti śaiśavam // AKad_4.27 //

analyzed: yugalakam

analyzed: acchoda sarasi snātum āgatā iha saha ambayā

analyzed: abhyajighram an āghrāta pūrvam āmodam adbhutam

analyzed: kalaṅka vipruṣā bimbam a dūṣitam iva aindavam

analyzed: akārṣam vandanam tasmai tad mukha nyasta locanā

analyzed: nityam saṃnihitā tatra lakṣmīḥ enam vyalokayat

analyzed: puṇḍarīke kṛtārtha tvam avāpa sva āsanīkṛte

original: nāma janmocitaṃ cāsya puṇḍarīka iti vyadhāt // AKad_4.48 //
analyzed: nāma janma ucitam ca asya puṇḍarīkaḥ iti vyadhāt

original: atīte bālabhāve ca nyayuṅkta tapase pitā // AKad_4.49 //
analyzed: atīte bāla bhāve ca nyayuṅkta tapase pitā

original: caturdaśīti kṛtvādya prasthito 'yaṃ śivālayam // AKad_4.50 //
analyzed: caturdaśī iti kṛtvā adya prasthitaḥ yam śivālayam

original: vrajato nandanenāsya vanadevatayā svayam /

analyzed: yugalakam

original: *yugalakam*
analyzed: yugalakam

analyzed: tatas pratinivṛttāyām mayi tam sa sakhā avadat

original: *yugalakam*

analyzed: kiñcid saṃjāta lajjā iva sarasaḥ tīram āgamam

original: atrāham asvatantraiva kṣaṇaṃ snātvā yathā tathā /

original: agaccham ambayā sākaṃ tadguṇādhyāyinī gṛham // AKad_4.63 //

analyzed: kim idam kaḥ prakāraḥ yam iti tadā

analyzed: priyā taralikā nāma praviśya idam atha abravīt

analyzed: tasyām tu likhitām āryām imām aham avācayam

analyzed: haṃsaḥ iva darśita āśaḥ mānasajanmā tvayā nītaḥ

analyzed: mohāya āryā api anāryā iva sutarām manasaḥ mama

analyzed: kāñcid ahnaḥ tatas mātrām unmattā iva atyavāhayam

analyzed: bhartṛ dārikayā dṛṣṭau yau tau muni kumārakau

analyzed: śīghram praveśaya iti uktā mayā tad abhiśaṅkayā

analyzed: mad uttarīya saṃmṛṣṭa su dhauta caraṇa dvayaḥ

analyzed: katham bhaviṣyati iti eṣā cintā dalayati iva mām

analyzed: jahāra cetanām mūrchā nidrā iva nayana dyutim

original: rakṣyantām ātmanaḥ prāṇā yūnas tasya ca sarvathā // AKad_4.101 //
analyzed: rakṣyantām ātmanaḥ prāṇāḥ yūnaḥ tasya ca sarvathā

analyzed: gandharvāṇām vivāhaḥ yam icchayā anyonya saṃgamaḥ

analyzed: tām ekām agratas kṛtvā nirgatā aham alakṣitā

analyzed: tadā me dakṣiṇam cakṣuḥ aspandata muhur muhur

original: avyaktam iva cāśrauṣaṃ kānane ruditadhvanim /

original: gatvā tātasya vakṣyāmi śvetaketoḥ kim agrataḥ // AKad_4.107 //
analyzed: gatvā tātasya vakṣyāmi śvetaketoḥ kim agratas

original: tato 'śṛṇavam ityādi vilapantaṃ kapiñjalam // AKad_4.109 //
analyzed: ityādi vilapantam kapiñjalam

original: *cakkalakam*
analyzed: cakkalakam

original: atha pravepamānāṅgī visaṃsthulapadakramā /

original: kenāpyutkṣipya nīteva taṃ pradeśamayāśiṣam // AKad_4.110 //
analyzed: kena api utkṣipya nītā iva tam pradeśam ayā āśiṣam

original: gatvā tam aham adrākṣaṃ tatkṣaṇotkrāntajīvitam /

original: kiṃ cireṇāgatāsīti ruṣitveva tathā sthitam // AKad_4.111 //
analyzed: kim cireṇa āgatā asi iti ruṣitvā iva tathā sthitam

original: vivakṣantīva sā kanyā nipapāta śilātale // AKad_4.112 //
analyzed: vivakṣantī iva sā kanyā nipapāta śilā tale

original: pranaṣṭacetanāṃ caināṃ candrāpīḍo 'valokayan /
analyzed: pranaṣṭa cetanām ca enām candrāpīḍaḥ valokayan

original: praśnakāriṇam ātmānaṃ kṛtāgasam amanyata // AKad_4.113 //
analyzed: praśna kāriṇam ātmānam kṛta āgasam amanyata

original: sasambhramaṃ samutthāya kadalīdalamārutaiḥ /
analyzed: sa sambhramam samutthāya kadalī dala mārutaiḥ

original: toyaiś ca śiśirasvacchaiḥ saṃjñām enām ajigrahat // AKad_4.114 //
analyzed: toyaiḥ ca śiśira su acchaiḥ saṃjñām enām ajigrahat

original: avāpya cetanām eṣā smṛtvā tadvyasanaṃ nijam /
analyzed: avāpya cetanām eṣā smṛtvā tad vyasanam nijam

original: tad evānubhavantīva ruroda vilalāpa ca // AKad_4.115 //
analyzed: tat eva anubhavantī iva ruroda vilalāpa ca

original: pratiśabdanibhenoccaiḥ kakubho 'py arudann iva // AKad_4.116 //
analyzed: pratiśabda nibhena uccais kakubhaḥ pi arudan iva

original: candrāpīḍo 'tha tām āha bāṣparuddhavilocanaḥ /
analyzed: candrāpīḍaḥ tha tām āha bāṣpa ruddha vilocanaḥ

original: āstāṃ na śakyate vaktuṃ śrotuṃ cānyad ataḥ param // AKad_4.117 //
analyzed: āstām na śakyate vaktum śrotum ca anyat atas param

original: katham apy upasaṃhṛtya śokāvegaṃ tu sāvadat /
analyzed: katham api upasaṃhṛtya śoka āvegam tu sā avadat

original: kim ataḥ param asty anyad vācyaṃ śrotavyam eva vā // AKad_4.118 //
analyzed: kim atas param asti anyat vācyam śrotavyam eva vā

original: kiṃ tu kleśāya yenāśāleśena hatajīvitam /
analyzed: kim tu kleśāya yena āśā leśena hata jīvitam

original: rājaputra bibharmīdaṃ tad āścaryaṃ bravīmi te // AKad_4.119 //
analyzed: rāja putra bibharmi idam tat āścaryam bravīmi te

original: tadā tasyātitīvrasya duḥkhabhārasya tādṛśī /
analyzed: tadā tasya ati tīvrasya duḥkha bhārasya tādṛśī

original: na kācin maraṇādanyā mayāgrāhi pratikriyā // AKad_4.120 //
analyzed: na kācid maraṇāt anyā mayā agrāhi pratikriyā

original: maraṇavyavasāyaniścalā kṛtavaty asmi ca saṃvidhānakam /
analyzed: maraṇa vyavasāya niścalā kṛtavatī asmi ca saṃvidhānakam

original: niriyāya ca candramaṇḍalāt puruṣaḥ ko 'pi himopamadyutiḥ // AKad_4.121 //
analyzed: niriyāya ca candra maṇḍalāt puruṣaḥ kaḥ pi hima upama dyutiḥ

original: so 'vatīrya gaganān mahītale taṃ nidhāya bhujapañjarāntare /
analyzed: saḥ vatīrya gaganāt mahī tale tam nidhāya bhuja pañjara antare

original: utpatan divam udārayā girā mām avocata piteva sāntvayan // AKad_4.122 //
analyzed: utpatan divam udārayā girā mām avocata pitā iva sāntvayan

original: virama maraṇodyogād asmāt priyeṇa tavāmunā punar api mahāśvete vatse bhaviṣyati saṃgamaḥ /
analyzed: virama maraṇa udyogāt asmāt priyeṇa tava amunā punar api mahāśvete vatse bhaviṣyati saṃgamaḥ

original: iti giram ahaṃ tasmāc chrutvā sasambhramavismayā kim idam iti taṃ tatrāpṛcchaṃ prasṛtya kapiñjalam // AKad_4.123 //
analyzed: iti giram aham tasmāt śrutvā sa sambhrama vismayā kim idam iti tam tatra apṛccham prasṛtya kapiñjalam

original: priyasakham apahṛtya kvādhunā gacchasīti sphuritavikaṭakopāṭopamuktordhvadṛṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: priya sakham apahṛtya kva adhunā gacchasi iti sphurita vikaṭa kopa āṭopa mukta ūrdhva dṛṣṭiḥ

original: mama vacanam adattvā kiñcid evātivegā kṛtaparikarabandhaḥ so 'py agād antarikṣam // AKad_4.124 //
analyzed: mama vacanam a dattvā kiñcid evā ativegā kṛta parikara bandhaḥ saḥ u pi agāt antarikṣam

original: paśyantyāṃ mayi te trayo 'pi viviśuḥ śītatviṣo maṇḍalaṃ tatsampratyayasaṃhṛtocitavidhiḥ sāhaṃ śritedaṃ vratam /
analyzed: paśyantyām mayi te trayaḥ viviśuḥ śīta tviṣaḥ maṇḍalam tad sampratyaya saṃhṛta ucita vidhiḥ sā aham śritā idam vratam

original: tātenaitya tataḥ prabhṛty aham ihāsīnātha netuṃ gṛhaṃ yatnenāpi na pāriteti suciraṃ sthitvā gataḥ svān gṛhān // AKad_4.125 //
analyzed: tātena etya tatas prabhṛti aham iha āsīnā atha netum gṛham yatnena api na pāritā iti su ciram sthitvā gataḥ svān gṛhān

original: iti śrīvipaścidvarāgragaṇyācāryabhaṭṭaśrījayantasūnor abhinandasya kṛtau kādambarīkathāsāre caturthaḥ sargaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī vipaścit vara agragaṇya ācārya bhaṭṭa śrī jayantasūnoḥ abhinandasya kṛtau kādambarī kathā sāre caturthaḥ sargaḥ

original: pañcamaḥ sargaḥ
analyzed: pañcamaḥ sargaḥ

original: ity āveditanirvyājanijavṛttāntavistarā /

original: virarāma mahāśvetā niḥśvāsaglapitādharā // AKad_5.1 //
analyzed: virarāma mahā śvetā niḥśvāsa glapita adharā

original: candrāpīḍas tu taddhyāyanmanobhavavijṛmbhitam /
analyzed: candrāpīḍaḥ tu tat dhyāyan manobhava vijṛmbhitam

original: sakampavismayo 'py antas tām avocata sāntvayan // AKad_5.2 //
analyzed: sa kampa vismayaḥ pi antar tām avocata sāntvayan

original: mayā te ciravṛtto 'pi pariṇāmamapaśyatā /
analyzed: mayā te cira vṛttaḥ pi pariṇāmam a paśyatā

original: śokaḥ pratyagratāṃ nītaḥ kautukāviṣṭacetasā // AKad_5.3 //
analyzed: śokaḥ pratyagra tām nītaḥ kautuka āviṣṭa cetasā

original: sā tvamarhasi kalyāṇi na śokaṃ kartum īdṛśam /
analyzed: sā tvam arhasi kalyāṇi na śokam kartum īdṛśam

original: āśvāsitāsi devena nūnaṃ candramasā svayam // AKad_5.4 //
analyzed: āśvāsitā asi devena nūnam candramasā svayam

original: ko 'nyas tathāvidhākāras tacchaktir maṇḍalāt tataḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ tathāvidha ākāraḥ tad śaktiḥ maṇḍalāt tatas

original: nirgatya tatraiva viśan niśi sambhāvyate naraḥ // AKad_5.5 //
analyzed: nirgatya tatra eva viśan niśi sambhāvyate naraḥ

original: śrūyante gatayaś citrā devatānām anekaśaḥ /
analyzed: śrūyante gatayaḥ citrāḥ devatānām anekaśas

original: varaśāpatapaḥśaktiyogavaicitryanirmitāḥ // AKad_5.6 //
śvetaketuś ca tasyāste prajāpatisamaḥ pitā /
analyzed: śvetaketuḥ ca tasya āste prajāpati samaḥ pitā

original: nāsty eva tasya tapasām asādhyaṃ nāma kiñcana // AKad_5.7 //
analyzed: na asti eva tasya tapasām asādhyam nāma kiñcana

original: ityādiyuktyupanyāsair itihāsanidarśanaiḥ /
analyzed: ityādi yukti upanyāsaiḥ itihāsa nidarśanaiḥ

original: mahāśvetāṃ samāśvāsya punaḥ papraccha tām asau // AKad_5.8 //
analyzed: mahāśvetām samāśvāsya punar papraccha tām asau

original: sā te taralikā nāma visrambhanibhṛtā sakhī /
analyzed: sā te taralikā nāma visrambha nibhṛtā sakhī

original: gatā bhagavati kvādya na hi sā tvāṃ vimuñcati // AKad_5.9 //
analyzed: gatā bhagavati kva adya na hi sā tvām vimuñcati

original: athovāca mahāśvetā kvāsau yāti tapasvinī /
analyzed: athā uvāca mahāśvetā kva asau yāti tapasvinī

original: śṛṇvannāpi nimittaṃ te yathā sā prahitā mayā // AKad_5.10 //
analyzed: śṛṇvan na api nimittam te yathā sā prahitā mayā

original: yaḥ sa citraratho nāma gandharvādhipatirmayā /
analyzed: yaḥ sa citrarathaḥ nāma gandharva adhipatiḥ mayā

original: varṇito yena devo 'yaṃ pratyaṣṭāpi maheśvaraḥ // AKad_5.11 //
analyzed: varṇitaḥ yena devaḥ yam pratyaṣṭā api maheśvaraḥ

original: yena khānitam atyaccham acchodākhyam idaṃ saraḥ /
analyzed: yena khānitam atyaccham acchoda ākhyam idam saraḥ

original: yena caitrarathaṃ nāma kṛtam etac ca kānanam // AKad_5.12 //
analyzed: yena caitraratham nāma kṛtam etat ca kānanam

original: tasyāmṛtasamudbhūte prasūtāpsarasāṃ kule /
analyzed: tasya amṛta samudbhūte prasūtā apsarasām kule

analyzed: mahiṣī madirā nāma jīvitāt api vallabhā

analyzed: tayoḥ kādambarī nāma kanyā asti nava yauvanā

analyzed: lakṣmīm upahasantī iva rūpa lāvaṇya vibhramaiḥ

original: tayā saha mahat prema bālyāt prabhṛti me tathā /
analyzed: tayā saha mahat prema bālyāt prabhṛti me tathā

original: yathaikam eva jānāti jano jīvitam āvayoḥ // AKad_5.15 //
analyzed: yathā ekam eva jānāti janaḥ jīvitam āvayoḥ

original: viditvā dagdhavṛttāntam imaṃ sapadi māmakam /

original: sāgrahīn niyamaṃ bālā vāryamāṇāpi bandhubhiḥ // AKad_5.16 //
analyzed: sā agrahīt niyamam bālā vāryamāṇā api bandhubhiḥ

original: mahāśvetāsya duḥkhasya yāvan na labhate 'vadhim /

original: tāvan mayā na kartavyaṃ pāṇigrahaṇam ātmanaḥ // AKad_5.17 //
analyzed: tāvat mayā na kartavyam pāṇigrahaṇam ātmanaḥ

original: ato yathā yathā tasyā yauvanaśrīr vijṛmbhate /

original: tathā tathā tato dhatte khedaṃ citrarathaḥ param // AKad_5.18 //
analyzed: tathā tathā tatas dhatte khedam citrarathaḥ param

analyzed: yathā imam durgraha granthim vimuñcati tava svasā

original: prahitā bahu saṃdiśya śvaś cāganteha sā punaḥ // AKad_5.20 //
analyzed: prahitā bahu saṃdiśya śvas ca āganta iha sā punar

original: itītthaṃ kathayā nītvā mahāśvetāśrame dinam /

original: candrāpīḍaḥ prayāte 'stam arke saṃdhyāvidhiṃ vyadhāt // AKad_5.21 //
analyzed: candrāpīḍaḥ prayāte stam arke saṃdhyā vidhim vyadhāt

original: tatrendrāyudham ānīya saṃyamya nicule kvacit /

analyzed: mahāśveta udite deśe parṇa śayyām akalpayat

original: kathām āścaryabahulāṃ tām eva dhyāyataś ciram // AKad_5.23 //
analyzed: kathām āścarya bahulām tām eva dhyāyataḥ ciram

original: punaś cintayataḥ senāṃ vaiśampāyanam eva ca /
analyzed: punar cintayataḥ senām vaiśampāyanam eva ca

original: pattralekhāṃ ca sā rātrir gatā prāyeṇa jāgrataḥ // AKad_5.24 //
analyzed: pattralekhām ca sā rātriḥ gatā prāyeṇa jāgrataḥ

analyzed: sa pratyabhijñam aśvaḥ u pi bhṛśam mānuṣa vat dadau

original: prayātāyāṃ tu yāminyāṃ kṛtaprābhātikakriye /

analyzed: samādheḥ utthitām buddhvā mahāśvetām tad antikam

analyzed: sa gandharva kumārā asau tatas taralikā yayau

analyzed: siddhārthā asi iti tat pṛṣṭā valitagrīvam abravīt

analyzed: tvad saṃdeśam niśamya uktam yat tayā bhartṛ dārike

original: tattvaṃ tacchāsanāyātakeyūrakamukhācchṛṇu // AKad_5.29 //
analyzed: tat tvam tad śāsana āyāta keyūraka mukhāt śṛṇu

original: svasya svameva cedaṃ te manmanaḥ kiṃ parīkṣase // AKad_5.30 //
analyzed: svasya svam eva ca idam te mad manaḥ kim parīkṣase

original: athavā bhūmir asyāham upālambhasya bhūyasaḥ /

original: tapovananivāsinyāṃ tvayi svagṛhavartinī // AKad_5.31 //
analyzed: tapovana nivāsinyām tvayi sva gṛha vartinī

analyzed: eṣa te pratisaṃdeśaḥ priya sakhyā niveditaḥ

original: iti śrutvā mahāśvetā kṣaṇaṃ niścalalocanā /

original: cintayitvā kim apy antaś candrāpīḍam abhāṣata // AKad_5.33 //
analyzed: cintayitvā kim api antar candrāpīḍam abhāṣata

original: rājaputra tavākāraḥ sadācāraś ca peśalaḥ /

original: tanoti sarvabhāvena niḥspṛhāṇām api spṛhām // AKad_5.34 //
analyzed: tanoti sarva bhāvena niḥspṛhāṇām api spṛhām

original: kādambarīvacaś cedaṃ śrutaṃ keyūrakāt tvayā /

original: tatra ko vā pratīkāraḥ svayaṃ madgamanād ṛte // AKad_5.35 //
analyzed: tatra kaḥ vā pratīkāraḥ svayam mad gamanāt ṛte

original: ito na dūre gandharvarājadhānī tadadya tām /

original: paśyāsmadanusedhena śvo gantāsi svavāhinīm // AKad_5.36 //
analyzed: paśya asmad anusedhena śvas gantāsi sva vāhinīm

analyzed: bahu gandharva lokasya mayā api upakṛtam bhavet

original: anatikramaṇīyaṃ me munīnām api śāsanam // AKad_5.38 //
analyzed: an atikramaṇīyam me munīnām api śāsanam

original: prāvartata tato gantuṃ sa mahāśvetayā saha /

original: padbhyām eva niyujyāśvaṃ prati keyūrakaṃ dṛśā // AKad_5.39 //

original: tasyāgamanam ākāraṃ guṇāṃś cāhitavismayān // AKad_5.40 //
analyzed: tasya āgamanam ākāram guṇān ca ahita vismayān

analyzed: gandharvarāja nagarīm aparām amarāvatīm

original: āsādya rājadhānīṃ ca tuṅgasphaṭikatoraṇām /
analyzed: āsādya rājadhānīm ca tuṅga sphaṭika toraṇām

original: sapta kakṣā atikramya kanyāntaḥpuram abhyagāt // AKad_5.42 //
analyzed: sapta kakṣāḥ atikramya kanyā antaḥpuram abhyagāt

original: keyūrakopadiṣṭena vartmanātha praviśya saḥ /

original: bhāsvanmaṇimayastambhaṃ śrīmaṇḍapam alokayat // AKad_5.43 //
analyzed: bhāsvat maṇi maya stambham śrī maṇḍapam alokayat

original: tanmadhye maṇiparyaṅkamadhyāsīnāṃ mahīyasā /

analyzed: ratna ābharaṇa citreṇa straiṇena parivāritām

original: prataptakanakoddyotadhautā vidadhatīṃ diśaḥ // AKad_5.45 //

analyzed: sthitām navasya lāvaṇya sindhoḥ antar taraṅgiṇaḥ

original: sarvopameyabhāvānām upamānatvam āgatām /

original: kādambarīṃ dadarśāsau dūravisphāritekṣaṇaḥ // AKad_5.47 //
analyzed: kādambarīm dadarśa asau dūra visphārita īkṣaṇaḥ

original: parātiśayakoṭistharūpalāvaṇyasampadam /

original: tasyāṃ nirūpayann antar acintayad atha kṣaṇam // AKad_5.48 //
analyzed: tasyām nirūpayan antar acintayat atha kṣaṇam

original: satyaṃ na kaścid āścaryanirmāṇeṣv avadhir vidheḥ /
analyzed: satyam na kaścid āścarya nirmāṇeṣu avadhiḥ vidheḥ

original: īdṛśāny api ratnāni sraṣṭuṃ prabhavati sma yaḥ // AKad_5.49 //
analyzed: īdṛśāni api ratnāni sraṣṭum prabhavati sma yaḥ

original: moghaṃ yāti hareḥ kālo lakṣmīṃ vakṣasi bibhrataḥ /
analyzed: mogham yāti hareḥ kālaḥ lakṣmīm vakṣasi bibhrataḥ

original: dehārdhena vahan gaurīṃ vañcitaś candraśekharaḥ // AKad_5.50 //
analyzed: deha ardhena vahan gaurīm vañcitaḥ candraśekharaḥ

original: kṛtam akṣṇāṃ sahasreṇa nirnimeṣeṇa vajriṇaḥ /
analyzed: kṛtam akṣṇām sahasreṇa nirnimeṣeṇa vajriṇaḥ

original: ananyakarmaṇā yena nityam eṣā na dṛśyate // AKad_5.51 //
analyzed: an anya karmaṇā yena nityam eṣā na dṛśyate

original: ityādi cintayaty asminn atha citrarathātmajā /
analyzed: ityādi cintayati asmin atha citraratha ātmajā

analyzed: pratyudyayau mahā śvetām abhyutthāya sa sambhramam

original: mahāśvetā tu niḥśaṅkam āliṅgya snehanirbharam /
analyzed: mahāśvetā tu niḥśaṅkam āliṅgya sneha nirbharam

original: tāṃ candrāpīḍanirdeśapuraḥsaram abhāṣata // AKad_5.53 //
analyzed: tām candrāpīḍa nirdeśa puraḥsaram abhāṣata

original: ayaṃ hi bhārate varṣe sārvabhaumasya bhūpateḥ /
analyzed: ayam hi bhārate varṣe sārvabhaumasya bhūpateḥ

original: tārāpīḍasya tanayaś candrāpīḍa ihāgataḥ // AKad_5.54 //
analyzed: tārāpīḍasya tanayaḥ candrāpīḍaḥ iha āgataḥ

original: aneneha praviṣṭena dṛṣṭer viṣayavartinā /
analyzed: anena iha praviṣṭena dṛṣṭeḥ viṣaya vartinā

original: bhavatv akhilagandharvakuṭumbakamahotsavaḥ // AKad_5.55 //
analyzed: bhavatu akhila gandharva kuṭumbaka mahā utsavaḥ

original: atha kādambarī tasmin pakṣmotkṣepavikāsinīm /
analyzed: atha kādambarī tasmin pakṣma utkṣepa vikāsinīm

original: ākarṇaprasṛtāpāṅgāṃ ciraṃ dṛśam apātayat // AKad_5.56 //
analyzed: ākarṇa prasṛta apāṅgām ciram dṛśam apātayat

original: dvāreṇa vivṛtenātha tenaiva nijamāyayā /
analyzed: dvāreṇa vivṛtena atha tena eva nija māyayā

original: madano 'ntaḥ praviśyāsyā babandha hṛdaye padam // AKad_5.57 //
analyzed: madanaḥ ntar praviśya asyāḥ babandha hṛdaye padam

original: ratnapīṭhopaviṣṭe tu candrāpīḍe tadantike /
analyzed: ratna pīṭha upaviṣṭe tu candrāpīḍe tad antike

original: adhyāsātāṃ kathām ekāṃ haṃsacitrarathātmaje // AKad_5.58 //
analyzed: adhyāsātām kathām ekām haṃsa citraratha ātmaje

original: lajjāstimitam āsīnām atha kādambarīṃ balāt /
analyzed: lajjā stimitam āsīnām atha kādambarīm balāt

original: mahāśvetā gṛhācāraṃ candrāpīḍe nyadhāpayat // AKad_5.59 //
analyzed: mahāśvetā gṛha ācāram candrāpīḍe nyadhāpayat

original: śarīranirviśeṣāsyāḥ kādambaryāḥ priyā sakhī /
analyzed: śarīra nirviśeṣā asyāḥ kādambaryāḥ priyā sakhī

original: madalekhābhidhānāsya caraṇākṣālanaṃ vyadhāt // AKad_5.60 //
analyzed: madalekhā abhidhānā asya caraṇa ākṣālanam vyadhāt

original: kādambarī tu sasvedaprakampikarapallavā /
tāmbūlacchadmanātmānaṃ svayam asmai nyavedayat // AKad_5.61 //
analyzed: tāmbūla chadmanā ātmānam svayam asmai nyavedayat

original: tadaṅgulitalasparśamādhuryahṛtamānasā /
analyzed: tad aṅguli tala sparśa mādhurya hṛta mānasā

original: nālakṣayata sā ratnavalayaṃ skhalitaṃ karāt // AKad_5.62 //
analyzed: na alakṣayata sā ratna valayam skhalitam karāt

original: candrāpīḍo 'pi tatpāṇisaṃsparśasukhasampadā /
analyzed: candrāpīḍaḥ pi tad pāṇi saṃsparśa sukha sampadā

original: tadā tribhuvanādhīśam ivātmānam amanyata // AKad_5.63 //
analyzed: tadā tribhuvana adhīśam iva ātmānam amanyata

original: tatas tūṣṇīm upāsīne sarvasmin kanyakājane /
analyzed: tatas tūṣṇīm upāsīne sarvasmin kanyakā jane

original: śukaśārikayor āsit kalahaḥ kelikāraṇam // AKad_5.64 //
analyzed: śuka śārikayoḥ āsit kalahaḥ keli kāraṇam

original: tatprasaṅge ca sotprāsaṃ tayoḥ kalahavṛddhaye /
analyzed: tad prasaṅge ca sa utprāsam tayoḥ kalaha vṛddhaye

original: candrāpīḍo 'bravīd yena sarvā jahasuraṅganāḥ // AKad_5.65 //
analyzed: candrāpīḍaḥ bravīt yena sarvāḥ jahasuḥ aṅganāḥ

original: tāś ca dantaprabhādhautadiṅmukhā madhurasvarāḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ ca danta prabhā dhauta diṅmukhāḥ madhura svarāḥ

original: candrāpīḍagiro jahrustarāṃ kādambarīmanaḥ // AKad_5.66 //
analyzed: candrāpīḍa giraḥ jahruḥ tarām kādambarī manaḥ

original: kṣaṇamātre vyatīte 'tha praviśya prāha kañcukī /
analyzed: kṣaṇa mātre vyatīte praviśya prāha kañcukī

original: rājaputryau yuvāṃ draṣṭuṃ devī nirvighnam icchati // AKad_5.67 //
analyzed: rāja putryau yuvām draṣṭum devī nirvighnam icchati

original: krīḍāparvatake kṛtvā sutāramaṇimandire /
analyzed: krīḍā parvatake kṛtvā sutāra maṇi mandire

original: candrāpīḍaṃ sukhāsīnam āyātaṃ mātur antikam // AKad_5.68 //
analyzed: candrāpīḍam sukha āsīnam āyātam mātuḥ antikam

original: tatrādhyāsitaparyaṅkaṃ keyūrakapuraḥsarāḥ /
analyzed: tatra adhyāsita paryaṅkam keyūraka puraḥsarāḥ

original: mukhyāḥ kādambarīsakhyaś candrāpīḍaṃ siṣevire // AKad_5.69 //
analyzed: mukhyāḥ kādambarī sakhyaḥ candrāpīḍam siṣevire

original: snānānulepanāhārakriyāḥ sa tadupāhṛtaiḥ /
analyzed: snāna anulepana āhāra kriyāḥ sa tad upāhṛtaiḥ

original: cakre 'martyapuraprāpyair vibhavair upapāditāḥ // AKad_5.70 //
analyzed: cakre martya pura prāpyaiḥ vibhavaiḥ upapāditāḥ

original: atha mandaprabhe bhānau bheje kādabarī nijam /
analyzed: atha mandaprabhe bhānau bheje kādabarī nijam

original: madalekhādvitīyaiva mahāprāsādamastakam // AKad_5.71 //
analyzed: madalekhā dvitīyā eva mahā prāsāda mastakam

original: candrāpīḍaṃ ca tatrasthā krīḍāparvatavartinam /
analyzed: candrāpīḍam ca tatrasthā krīḍā parvata vartinam

original: niravarṇayadākarṇaprasṛtāpāṅgayā dṛśā // AKad_5.72 //
analyzed: niravarṇayat ākarṇa prasṛta apāṅgayā dṛśā

original: candrāpīḍe tadā tasyāḥ kaṭākṣās tīkṣṇakoṭayaḥ /
analyzed: candrāpīḍe tadā tasyāḥ kaṭākṣāḥ tīkṣṇa koṭayaḥ

original: samaṃ nipetus tasyāṃ ca kusumāyudhasāyakāḥ // AKad_5.73 //
analyzed: samam nipetuḥ tasyām ca kusumāyudha sāyakāḥ

original: kaṭākṣair upanītaṃ ca kṣipraṃ kṛtasamāgamaiḥ /
analyzed: kaṭākṣaiḥ upanītam ca kṣipram kṛta samāgamaiḥ

original: tallāvaṇyaṃ pibantīva madalekhām uvāca sā // AKad_5.74 //
analyzed: tat lāvaṇyam pibantī iva madalekhām uvāca sā

original: na mayā madano nāma kathāsvapi sakhi śrutaḥ /
analyzed: na mayā madanaḥ nāma kathāsu api sakhi śrutaḥ

original: adya pratyakṣato dṛṣṭaḥ sa candrāpīḍavigrahaḥ // AKad_5.75 //
analyzed: adya pratyakṣataḥ dṛṣṭaḥ sa candrāpīḍa vigrahaḥ

original: na mahāśvetayā kiñcid uktaṃ prakṛtavastuni /
analyzed: na mahāśvetayā kiñcid uktam prakṛta vastuni

original: atha cehānayantyāmuṃ sarvam uktam anakṣaram // AKad_5.76 //
analyzed: atha ca iha ānayanti amum sarvam uktam anakṣaram

original: api nāma vikāro me tadānīṃ lakṣitas tayā /
analyzed: api nāma vikāraḥ me tadānīm lakṣitaḥ tayā

original: kiṃ vā na lakṣayed eṣā dṛṣṭamanmathavikriyā // AKad_5.77 //
analyzed: kim vā na lakṣayet eṣā dṛṣṭa manmatha vikriyā

original: adyāpi nijasaṃkalpaviruddhāṃ vikriyām imām /
analyzed: adyā api nija saṃkalpa viruddhām vikriyām imām

original: manasaḥ saṃharāmy eva sthūlām api yathātathā // AKad_5.78 //
analyzed: manasaḥ saṃharāmi eva sthūlām api yathā tathā

original: kiṃ tv asau śeṣahāro 'syāstulyaṃ maṇḍanam ākṛteḥ /
analyzed: kim tu asau syāḥ tulyam maṇḍanam ākṛteḥ

original: urasy anicchato 'py asya tūrṇam āmucyatāṃ tvayā // AKad_5.79 //
analyzed: urasi an icchataḥ upi asya tūrṇam āmucyatām tvayā

original: madalekhā gṛhītvā taṃ hāraṃ gatvā tadantike /
analyzed: madalekhā gṛhītvā tam hāram gatvā tad antike

original: tathovāca yathā tena pratyuktā sā na kiñcana // AKad_5.80 //
analyzed: tathā uvāca yathā tena pratyuktā sā na kiñcana

original: āmucyata tataḥ kaṇṭhe hāro 'sya madalekhayā /
analyzed: āmucyata tatas kaṇṭhe hāraḥ sya mada lekhayā

original: śaradindukarodāraprabhāpūritadiṅmukhaḥ // AKad_5.81 //
candrāpīḍaś ca hāreṇa rarāja kṛtamaṇḍanaḥ /
analyzed: candrāpīḍaḥ ca hāreṇa rarāja kṛta maṇḍanaḥ

original: pūrṇendur iva nakṣatrakalāpaparivāritaḥ // AKad_5.82 //
analyzed: pūrṇa induḥ iva nakṣatra kalāpa parivāritaḥ

original: kādambarī ciraṃ tv enam avalokya niśāgame /
analyzed: kādambarī ciram tu enam avalokya niśā āgame

original: prāsādaśikharāt tasmān mandamandam avātarat // AKad_5.83 //
analyzed: prāsāda śikharāt tasmāt manda mandam avātarat

original: utthāya candrāpīḍo 'tha kṛtasaṃdhyāvidhis tataḥ /
analyzed: utthāya kṛta saṃdhyā vidhiḥ tatas

analyzed: avālambata dehena śayyām cintām ca cetasā

original: kiṃ syur gandharvakanyāyā vilāsāḥ sahajā ime /
analyzed: kim syuḥ gandharva kanyāyāḥ vilāsāḥ sahajāḥ ime

original: utemaṃ janam uddiśya bālāṃ nartayati smaraḥ // AKad_5.85 //
analyzed: uta imam janam uddiśya bālām nartayati smaraḥ

original: dṛṣṭirnipuṇadūtīva yathā tvasyā viceṣṭate /

analyzed: tathā sambhāvanā hi iyam mama cetasi vartate

original: avaimi puṣpitas tāvat kiṃnarānusṛtikramaḥ /
analyzed: avaimi puṣpitaḥ tāvat kiṃnara anusṛti kramaḥ

original: sa kālapariṇāmena na jāne kiṃ phaliṣyati // AKad_5.87 //
analyzed: sa kāla pariṇāmena na jāne kim phaliṣyati

original: athavā yauvanonmādakṛta eṣa mama bhramaḥ /
analyzed: athavā yauvana unmāda kṛtaḥ eṣa mama bhramaḥ

original: kva mānuṣyaḥ kva gandharva iti kiṃ tena saṃgatam // AKad_5.88 //
analyzed: kva mānuṣyaḥ kva gandharvaḥ iti kim tena saṃgatam

original: ātmasambhāvanā ceyamāstāmasadṛśakramā /
analyzed: ātma sambhāvanā ca iyam āstām asadṛśa kramā

original: kālena vyajyate sarvaṃ kathaṃ ca mama sainikāḥ // AKad_5.89 //
analyzed: kālena vyajyate sarvam katham ca mama sainikāḥ

original: iti cintayatas tasya nidrā sucirasambhṛtā /
analyzed: iti cintayataḥ tasya nidrā su cira sambhṛtā

original: cakāra mukulākāre cakṣuṣī ā niśātyayāt // AKad_5.90 //
analyzed: cakāra mukula ākāre cakṣuṣī ā niśātyayāt

original: aparedyur athotthāya kṛtaprābhātikakramaḥ /
analyzed: aparedyus atha utthāya kṛta prābhātika kramaḥ

original: kādambarīmahāśvete dṛṣṭvā labdhvā cirād iva // AKad_5.91 //
analyzed: kādambarī mahāśvete dṛṣṭvā labdhvā cirāt iva

original: tadanujñāṃ tadādiṣṭagandharvaparivāritaḥ /
analyzed: tad anujñām tad ādiṣṭa gandharva parivāritaḥ

original: sa indrāyudham āruhya pratasthe pṛtanāṃ prati // AKad_5.92 //
analyzed: saḥ indrāyudham āruhya pratasthe pṛtanām prati

original: atha kenāpy upāyena labdhamārgam asau nijam /
analyzed: atha kena api upāyena labdha mārgam asau nijam

original: saṃniviṣṭaṃ sarastīre skandhāvāraṃ vyalokayat // AKad_5.93 //
analyzed: saṃniviṣṭam saraḥ tīre skandhāvāram vyalokayat

original: tatra dṛṣṭvā nṛpān sarvān mantriputraṃ rahasy asau /
analyzed: tatra dṛṣṭvā nṛpān sarvān mantri putram rahasi asau

original: svavṛttāntavidaṃ cakre pattralekhāṃ viśeṣataḥ // AKad_5.94 //
analyzed: sva vṛttānta vidam cakre pattralekhām viśeṣataḥ

original: niśi tasyām atītāyām anyedyur udite ravau /
analyzed: niśi tasyām atītāyām anyedyus udite ravau

original: keyūrakastam āgatya hemakūṭād abhāṣata // AKad_5.95 //
analyzed: keyūrakaḥ tam āgatya hemakūṭāt abhāṣata

original: kādambarī na paṭvīti tvām abhīṣṇaṃ didṛkṣate /
analyzed: kādambarī na paṭvī iti tvām abhīṣṇam didṛkṣate

original: vismṛtaṃ śayanīye ca śeṣahāram upāharat // AKad_5.96 //
analyzed: vismṛtam śayanīye ca śeṣa hāram upāharat

original: keyūrakavacaḥ śrutvā sametaḥ pattralekhayā /
analyzed: keyūra kavacaḥ śrutvā sametaḥ pattralekhayā

original: candrāpīḍaḥ punas tūrṇaṃ hemakūṭam athāgamat // AKad_5.97 //
analyzed: candrāpīḍaḥ punar tūrṇam hemakūṭam atha agamat

original: abhivandya mahāśvetāṃ ślāghitāgamanas tayā /
analyzed: abhivandya mahāśvetām ślāghita āgamanaḥ tayā

original: kādambarīm athāpaśyat pattralekhāpuraḥsaraḥ // AKad_5.98 //
analyzed: kādambarīm athā apaśyat pattra lekhā puraḥsaraḥ

original: udyānanalinītīrakalpite himamandire /
analyzed: udyāna nalinī tīra kalpite hima mandire

original: kadalīdalaśayyāntarniṣaṇṇāṃ mlānavigrahām // AKad_5.99 //
analyzed: kadalī dala śayyā antar niṣaṇṇām mlāna vigrahām

original: tadālokanamātreṇa muhur āśvāsiteva sā /
analyzed: tad ālokana mātreṇa muhur āśvāsitā iva sā

original: tata utthātum icchantī śayānaivāsta tadgirā // AKad_5.100 //
analyzed: tatas utthātum icchantī śayānā evā āsta tad girā

original: tataḥ kuśalasampraśnasukhamātrapavitritāḥ /
analyzed: tatas kuśala sampraśna sukha mātra pavitritāḥ

original: nānānarmavilāsārdrāḥ prāvartanta tayor giraḥ // AKad_5.101 //
analyzed: nānā narma vilāsa ārdrāḥ prāvartanta tayoḥ giraḥ

original: tathā tatra ciraṃ sthitvā tāṃ tathā vaśavartinīm /
analyzed: tathā tatra ciram sthitvā tām tathā vaśa vartinīm

original: bhaṅgībhaṇitibhir vyaktam āvedya nijam āśayam // AKad_5.102 //
analyzed: bhaṅgī bhaṇitibhiḥ vyaktam āvedya nijam āśayam

original: tadabhyarthanayādiśya pattralekhāṃ tadantike /
analyzed: tad abhyarthanayā ādiśya pattralekhām tad antike

original: keyūrakadvitīyo 'sau jagāma kaṭakaṃ punaḥ // AKad_5.103 //
analyzed: keyūraka dvitīyaḥ sau jagāma kaṭakam punar

original: tatrojjayinyāḥ samprāptaṃ pūrvedyur lekhahārakam /
analyzed: tatra ujjayinyāḥ samprāptam pūrvedyus lekhahārakam

original: avalokya tadānīṃ taṃ lekhaṃ svayam avācayat // AKad_5.104 //
analyzed: avalokya tadānīm tam lekham svayam avācayat

original: pitur ājñāṃ tato jñātvā śīghrāgamanaśaṃsinīm /
analyzed: pituḥ ājñām tatas jñātvā śīghra āgamana śaṃsinīm

original: keyūrakakare nyasya taṃ lekhaṃ kūṇitekṣaṇaḥ // AKad_5.105 //
analyzed: keyūraka kare nyasya tam lekham kūṇita īkṣaṇaḥ

original: tadartham atha saṃmantrya saha mantrisutena saḥ /
analyzed: tad artham atha saṃmantrya saha mantri sutena saḥ

original: evam etad iti dhyāyan prasthānasthairyam agrahīt // AKad_5.106 //
analyzed: evam etat iti dhyāyan prasthāna sthairyam agrahīt

original: satyaṃ vacmi bhavatprasādarasikaṃ ceto mamaitatpadaṃ gantuṃ necchati kiṃ tu śāsanam idaṃ nollaṅghanīyaṃ guroḥ /
analyzed: satyam vacmi bhavat prasāda rasikam cetaḥ mama etat padam gantum nā icchati kim tu śāsanam idam nā ullaṅghanīyam guroḥ

original: manyuḥ samprati sahyatāṃ punar ihāgantāsmi kādambarīṃ saṃdiśyeti sabāṣpagadgadam asau keyūrakaṃ prāhiṇot // AKad_5.107 //
analyzed: manyuḥ samprati sahyatām punar iha āgantāsmi kādambarīm saṃdiśya iti sa bāṣpa gadgadam asau keyūrakam prāhiṇot

original: vaiśampāyanam abhyabhāṣata bhavān saṃvāhayan vāhinīṃ paścād eṣyati yāmi satvaram ahaṃ svalpair ito vājibhiḥ /
analyzed: vaiśampāyanam abhyabhāṣata bhavān saṃvāhayan vāhinīm paścāt eṣyati yāmi sa tvaram aham su alpaiḥ itas vājibhiḥ

original: niścityeti tadā prayāṇapaṭahe datte pratasthe tato gatvā kiñcana caṇḍikāśramataṭīm adhyāsta tasmin dine // AKad_5.108 //
analyzed: niścitya iti tadā prayāṇa paṭahe datte pratasthe tatas gatvā kiñcana caṇḍikāśrama taṭīm adhyāsta tasmin dine

original: tatroddhatadraviḍadhārmikarūpaveṣabhāṣātapaścaraṇasiddhikathāvinodaiḥ /
analyzed: tatra uddhata draviḍa dhārmika rūpa veṣa bhāṣā tapaḥ caraṇa siddhi kathā vinodaiḥ

original: nītvā niśāṃ satatamaskhalitaprayāṇaiḥ svalpair dinais tvaritamujjayinīmavāpa // AKad_5.109 //
analyzed: nītvā niśām satatam askhalita prayāṇaiḥ su alpaiḥ dinaiḥ tvaritam ujjayinīm avāpa

original: iti śrīvipaścidvarāgragaṇyācāryabhaṭṭajayantasūnor abhinandasya kṛtau kādambarīkathāsāre pañcamaḥ sargaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī vipaścit vara agragaṇya ācārya bhaṭṭa jayanta sūnoḥ abhinandasya kṛtau kādambarī kathā sāre pañcamaḥ sargaḥ

original: ṣaṣṭhaḥ sargaḥ
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhaḥ sargaḥ

original: atha praviśya nagarīmupāsya pitarau ciram /
analyzed: atha praviśya nagarīm upāsya pitarau ciram

original: śukanāsaṃ ca so 'dhyāsta kumārabhavanaṃ punaḥ // AKad_6.1 //
analyzed: śuka nāsam ca saḥ dhyāsta kumāra bhavanam punar

original: tatra kādambarīdhyānanirataikāgracetasaḥ /
analyzed: tatra kādambarī dhyāna nirata ekāgra cetasaḥ

original: babhūva rataye nāsya kiñcitsthāsnu cariṣṇu ca // AKad_6.2 //
analyzed: babhūva rataye na asya kiñcid sthāsnu cariṣṇu ca

original: nākarot priyam āhāraṃ nābodhi madhuraṃ rasam /
analyzed: na akarot priyam āhāram na abodhi madhuram rasam

original: na cādriyata vāsāṃsi na siṣeve vilepanam // AKad_6.3 //
analyzed: na ca adriyata vāsāṃsi na siṣeve vilepanam

original: sārthacyuta ivādhvanyo yūthabhraṣṭa iva dvipaḥ /
analyzed: sārtha cyutaḥ iva adhvanyaḥ yūtha bhraṣṭaḥ iva dvipaḥ

original: vāgurāpāśasaṃruddha iva sāraṅgaśāvakaḥ // AKad_6.4 //
analyzed: vāgurā pāśa saṃruddhaḥ iva sāraṅga śāvakaḥ

original: divā vibhāvarīṃ dhyāyan niśi vāñchan dināgamam /
analyzed: divā vibhāvarīm dhyāyan niśi vāñchan dina āgamam

original: udīcīm eva sāsrākṣo vīkṣamāṇo 'niśaṃ diśam // AKad_6.5 //
analyzed: udīcīm eva sa asra akṣaḥ vīkṣamāṇaḥ niśam diśam

original: keyūrakādihāyātaṃ jñātvā māṃ kiṃ bhajedasau /
analyzed: keyūrakāt iha āyātam jñātvā mām kim bhajet asau

original: kiṃ vadet pattralekhāṃ vā sāpi kiṃ vocyate tayā // AKad_6.6 //
analyzed: kim vadet pattralekhām vā sā api kim vā ucyate tayā

original: iti naktandinaṃ dhyāyann anavāpitanirvṛtiḥ /
analyzed: iti naktandinam dhyāyan an avāpita nirvṛtiḥ

original: kālaṃ kiyantam apy evaṃ candrāpīḍo 'tyavāhayat // AKad_6.7 //
analyzed: kālam kiyantam api evam candrāpīḍo tyavāhayat

original: ākāraḥ saṃvṛtas tv īdṛg asya gūḍhātmano 'bhavat /
analyzed: ākāraḥ saṃvṛtaḥ tu īdṛś asya gūḍha ātmanaḥ bhavat

original: yathā tāṃ śūnyatāṃ tasya pitarau nādhijagmatuḥ // AKad_6.8 //
analyzed: yathā tām śūnyatām tasya pitarau na adhijagmatuḥ

original: dineṣv atha vyatīteṣu pattralekhā tadantikam /
analyzed: dineṣu atha vyatīteṣu pattralekhā tad antikam

original: prāpad balāhakāśvīyanirvṛttapathasauṣṭhavā // AKad_6.9 //
analyzed: prāpat balāhaka aśvīya nirvṛtta patha sauṣṭhavā

original: candrāpīḍo 'pi tāṃ dṛṣṭvā samucchvasitamānasaḥ /
analyzed: candrāpīḍaḥ pi tām dṛṣṭvā samucchvasita mānasaḥ

original: kādambarīm ivāmaṃsta pasparśa ca muhurmuhuḥ // AKad_6.10 //
analyzed: kādambarīm iva amaṃsta pasparśa ca muhur muhur

original: atha visrabdham aprākṣīd vada kādambarīkathām /
analyzed: atha visrabdham aprākṣīt vada kādambarī kathām

original: kim asmākaṃ smaraty eṣā ruṣitehāgamanena kim // AKad_6.11 //
analyzed: kim asmākam smarati eṣā ruṣitā iha āgamanena kim

original: sābhyasūyam ivālokya candrāpīḍam uvāca sā /
analyzed: sa abhyasūyam iva ālokya candrāpīḍam uvāca sā

original: kim etaccintayā deva gurūn ārādhaya sthiram // AKad_6.12 //
analyzed: kim etat cintayā deva gurūn ārādhaya sthiram

original: asau hi suprasannena svayaṃ makaraketunā /
analyzed: asau hi su prasannena svayam makaraketunā

original: tvayyarpitā vidhivaśācchrīpatau śrīrivābdhinā // AKad_6.13 //
analyzed: tvayi arpitā vidhi vaśāt śrīpatau śrīḥ iva abdhinā

original: tāṃ cābhinavabhāvārdrāṃ bālāṃ tarulatām iva /
analyzed: tām ca abhinava bhāva ārdrām bālām taru latām iva

original: tīvre virahadāvāgnau kṣiptavānasi kiṃ vṛthā // AKad_6.14 //
analyzed: tīvre viraha dāva agnau kṣiptavān asi kim vṛthā

original: keyūrakamukhād buddhvāgamanaṃ deva tāvakam /
analyzed: keyūraka mukhāt buddhvā āgamanam deva tāvakam

original: vajrāśanihatā śālivallarīva vyakampata // AKad_6.15 //
analyzed: vajra aśani hatā śāli vallarī iva vyakampata

original: labdhasthairyāvadan māṃ ca pattralekhe kim īdṛśam /
analyzed: labdha sthairyā avadat mām ca pattralekhe kim īdṛśam

original: yuktam etasya yanmanye rakṣāṃsy api na kurvate // AKad_6.16 //
analyzed: yuktam etasya yat manye rakṣāṃsi api na kurvate

original: tataḥ prabhṛti niḥśvāsair vardhamānair dinair iva /
analyzed: tatas prabhṛti niḥśvāsaiḥ vardhamānaiḥ dinaiḥ iva

original: krāntā grīṣmaniśevāsāvakṣīyata śanaiḥ śanaiḥ // AKad_6.17 //
analyzed: krāntā grīṣma niśā iva asau akṣīyata śanais śanais

original: alabdhakusumāmodāḥ prāgabhyāsādupāgatāḥ /
analyzed: a labdha kusuma āmodāḥ prāk abhyāsāt upāgatāḥ

original: dūrātpariharantyasyāḥ kabarīmadya ṣaṭpadāḥ // AKad_6.18 //
analyzed: dūrāt pariharanti asyāḥ kabarīm adya ṣaṭpadāḥ

original: rodanāruṇitāpāṅge ciraṃ vismṛtakajjale /
analyzed: rodana aruṇita apāṅge ciram vismṛta kajjale

original: netre mādhuryamutsṛjya gate tasyāḥ kaṣāyatām // AKad_6.19 //
analyzed: netre mādhuryam utsṛjya gate tasyāḥ kaṣāya tām

original: ciraṃ pattralatālekhyaṃ vihāya kriyate navam /
analyzed: ciram pattra latā lekhyam vihāya kriyate navam

original: maṇḍanaṃ gaṇḍayor aśrukaṇamuktāvalī tayā // AKad_6.20 //
analyzed: maṇḍanam gaṇḍayoḥ aśru kaṇa muktā āvalī tayā

original: mṛduḥ svabhāvaraktaś ca pravṛddhair asamoṣmabhiḥ /
analyzed: mṛduḥ svabhāva raktaḥ ca pravṛddhaiḥ asama ūṣmabhiḥ

original: mlānim ānīyate tasyā niḥśvāsair adharaḥ svaraiḥ // AKad_6.21 //
analyzed: mlānim ānīyate tasyāḥ niḥśvāsaiḥ adharaḥ svaraiḥ

original: stanau ca virahe tasyāḥ śokān na hi bahiṣkṛtau /
analyzed: stanau ca virahe tasyāḥ śokāt na hi bahiṣkṛtau

original: dāhapratikriyābhyastair hārakarpūracandanaiḥ // AKad_6.22 //
analyzed: dāha pratikriyā abhyastaiḥ hāra karpūra candanaiḥ

original: virahajvalanas tasyā lāvaṇyarasanirjharaiḥ /
analyzed: viraha jvalanaḥ tasyāḥ lāvaṇya rasa nirjharaiḥ

original: vāḍavaś cābdhinā naiti śamam ity adbhutadvayam // AKad_6.23 //
analyzed: vāḍavaḥ ca abdhinā nā eti śamam iti adbhuta dvayam

original: muhuḥ sarasi haṃsīva mṛgīvopavane muhuḥ /
analyzed: muhur sarasi haṃsī iva mṛgī iva upavane muhur

original: puline cakravākīva muhur luṭhati vihvalā // AKad_6.24 //
analyzed: puline cakravākī iva muhur luṭhati vihvalā

analyzed: muhur bhavantam āliṅgya puras saṃkalpa kalpitam

original: śūnye bhujalate vīkṣya vilakṣā patati kṣitau // AKad_6.25 //
analyzed: śūnye bhuja late vīkṣya vilakṣā patati kṣitau

original: mā gād ayam upālabdhaḥ saṃkalpād api dūrataḥ /
analyzed: mā gāt ayam upālabdhaḥ saṃkalpāt api dūratas

original: ity upālabhate na tvāṃ bhīteva manasāpi sā // AKad_6.26 //
analyzed: iti upālabhate na tvām bhītā iva manasā api sā

original: tvadākāramayaṃ dhyānaṃ tvadgotrapravaṇā giraḥ /
analyzed: tvad ākāra mayam dhyānam tvad gotra pravaṇāḥ giraḥ

original: tvadgātrakīlitā dṛṣṭis tasyāḥ samprati vartate // AKad_6.27 //
analyzed: tvad gātra kīlitā dṛṣṭiḥ tasyāḥ samprati vartate

original: kiyatī varṇyate tasyāḥ pareṇa virahavyathā /
analyzed: kiyatī varṇyate tasyāḥ pareṇa viraha vyathā

original: svasaṃvedanagamyā hi sā tayaivānubhūyate // AKad_6.28 //
analyzed: sva saṃvedana gamyā hi sā tayā eva anubhūyate

original: kim apy ākhyātukāmeva bahuśaḥ sphuritādharā /
analyzed: kim api ākhyātu kāmā iva bahuśas sphurita adharā

analyzed: hṛdaya sthena kena api guruṇā iva niṣidhyate

original: bhūmau viveṣṭamānāṅgī bhujaṅgīva kadāpy asau /
analyzed: bhūmau viveṣṭamāna aṅgī bhujaṅgī iva kadāpi asau

original: diśo vīkṣya madutsaṅge nidhāya mukham abravīt // AKad_6.30 //
analyzed: diśaḥ vīkṣya mad utsaṅge nidhāya mukham abravīt

original: uttiṣṭhānaya taṃ gatvā jīvantīṃ māṃ yadīcchasi /
analyzed: uttiṣṭha ānaya tam gatvā jīvantīm mām yadi icchasi

original: ahaṃ gantum aśaktā hi sudūram idam antaram // AKad_6.31 //
analyzed: aham gantum aśaktā hi su dūram idam antaram

analyzed: sthitāyām tvayi jīvāmi tvad sparśena yathā tathā

analyzed: gatāyām tu ciram kālam na sahante mama asavaḥ

analyzed: iti śrutvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca samāyātā asmi atas param

original: devaḥ pramāṇam ity uktvā rudatī virarāma sā // AKad_6.33 //
analyzed: devaḥ pramāṇam iti uktvā rudatī virarāma sā

original: candrāpīḍas tad ākarṇya gatasmṛtir ivābhavat /

analyzed: labdha smṛtiḥ ciram dadhyau gamane hetum ātmanaḥ

analyzed: āgāt keyūrakaḥ pi āśu dīrgha adhva śrānta vāhanaḥ

analyzed: sa ca ujjayinyāḥ vibhavam praviśan vīkṣya vismitaḥ

analyzed: sthāne nanu manaḥ lagnam svāminyāḥ iti amanyata

analyzed: praviśya dadṛśe tena candrāpīḍaḥ kṛśa ākṛtiḥ

original: cakravāka ivaikākī priyāvirahavihvalaḥ // AKad_6.37 //
analyzed: cakravākaḥ iva ekākī priyā viraha vihvalaḥ

analyzed: dadhatyā pārśva vartinyā cāmaram pattralekhayā

analyzed: saṃvījyamānaḥ paryaṅka niṣaṇṇa glāna vigrahaḥ

original: praṇipatyopaviṣṭo 'sau gāḍhaṃ śirasi paspṛśe /
analyzed: praṇipatya upaviṣṭaḥ sau gāḍham śirasi paspṛśe

analyzed: kurvatā kuśala praśnam candrāpīḍena sa ādaram

original: tataḥ kādambarīvārtāṃ pṛṣṭaḥ keyūrako 'munā /
analyzed: tatas kādambarī vārtām pṛṣṭaḥ keyūrakaḥ munā

original: pattralekhāmukhaṃ vīkṣya saṃkṣiptam idam abravīt // AKad_6.40 //
analyzed: pattralekhā mukham vīkṣya saṃkṣiptam idam abravīt

original: ukto 'si nānayā kiñcid uktaś cet kim iha sthitaḥ /
analyzed: uktaḥ si na anayā kiñcid uktaḥ ced kim iha sthitaḥ

original: uktaś ceha sthitaś cāsi kṛtam āgamanena me // AKad_6.41 //
analyzed: uktaḥ ca iha sthitaḥ ca asi kṛtam āgamanena me

original: tathāpi vada saṃdeśam iti tena tu coditaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api vada saṃdeśam iti tena tu coditaḥ

original: punaḥ keyūrakaḥ prāha na hi vijñāpyase mṛṣā // AKad_6.42 //
analyzed: punar keyūrakaḥ prāha na hi vijñāpyase mṛṣā

original: kathaṃ jīvatsu yuṣmāsu viraho hanti mām iti /
analyzed: katham jīvatsu yuṣmāsu virahaḥ hanti mām iti

original: tasyāḥ sākūtayā dṛṣṭyā visṛṣṭo 'smi na tadgirā // AKad_6.43 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ sa ākūtayā dṛṣṭyā visṛṣṭaḥ smi na tad girā

original: kim atra bahunoktena tathāsyā virahavyathā /
analyzed: kim atra bahunā uktena tathā asyāḥ viraha vyathā

original: adyāpi jīvatīty atra yathā dolāyate manaḥ // AKad_6.44 //
analyzed: adyā api jīvati iti atra yathā dolāyate manaḥ

original: tatkathābhis tathā sthitvā tasminn atha dine ciram /
analyzed: tad kathābhiḥ tathā sthitvā tasmin atha dine ciram

original: candrāpīḍaḥ sukhāvāsaṃ keyūrakam akārayat // AKad_6.45 //
analyzed: candrāpīḍaḥ sukha āvāsam keyūrakam akārayat

original: na rākṣaso na cāṇḍālo na kirātaś ca yady aham /
analyzed: na rākṣasaḥ na cāṇḍālaḥ na kirātaḥ ca yadi aham

original: acchodasarasas tīraṃ prāptaṃ māṃ vettha sarvathā // AKad_6.46 //
analyzed: acchoda sarasaḥ tīram prāptam mām vettha sarvathā

original: anyedyur iti saṃdiśya sahitaṃ pattralekhayā /
analyzed: anyedyus iti saṃdiśya sahitam pattralekhayā

original: keyūrakam asau ratnaiḥ prāhiṇot kṛtamaṇḍanam // AKad_6.47 //
analyzed: keyūrakam asau ratnaiḥ prāhiṇot kṛta maṇḍanam

original: tayos tu gatayor āsta sutarāṃ khinnamānasaḥ /
analyzed: tayoḥ tu gatayoḥ āsta sutarām khinna mānasaḥ

original: gamanāya dhiyā kiñcin nimittam anusaṃdadhat // AKad_6.48 //
analyzed: gamanāya dhiyā kiñcid nimittam anusaṃdadhat

original: śuśrāvātha niyuktebhyaḥ skandhāvāram upāgatam /
analyzed: śuśrāva atha niyuktebhyaḥ skandhāvāram upāgatam

original: yojanadvayamātraṃ ca punaḥ kṛtaniveśanam // AKad_6.49 //
analyzed: yojana dvaya mātram ca punar kṛta niveśanam

original: vaiśampāyanato lapsye kiñcit kāraṇam ity asau /
analyzed: vaiśampāyanataḥ lapsye kiñcid kāraṇam iti asau

original: pratyudgantum agād enaṃ kaṭakaṃ pitur ājñayā // AKad_6.50 //
analyzed: pratyudgantum agāt enam kaṭakam pituḥ ājñayā

original: tatra rājakam ālokya balāhakaniveditam /
analyzed: tatra rājakam ālokya balāhaka niveditam

original: kva vaiśampāyanāvāsa iti senānyam abhyadhāt // AKad_6.51 //
analyzed: kva vaiśampāyana āvāsaḥ iti senānyam abhyadhāt

original: balāhakas tv adhodṛṣṭir ullikhan medinīṃ muhuḥ /
analyzed: balāhakaḥ tu adhas dṛṣṭiḥ ullikhan medinīm muhur

original: na vaiśampāyano 'treti sannakaṇṭham abhāṣata // AKad_6.52 //
analyzed: na vaiśampāyano trā iti sannakaṇṭham abhāṣata

original: tato 'vatīrya turagādupaviśya taror adhaḥ /
analyzed: tatas vatīrya turagāt upaviśya taroḥ adhas

original: hā vayasyeti vilapanprāvartata sa roditum // AKad_6.53 //
analyzed: hā vayasya iti vilapan prāvartata sa roditum

original: balāhako nipatyātha candrāpīḍasya pādayoḥ /
analyzed: balāhakaḥ nipatya atha candrāpīḍasya pādayoḥ

original: deva maivaṃ kṛthāḥ so 'sti jīvann evety avocata // AKad_6.54 //
analyzed: deva mā evam kṛthāḥ saḥ sti jīvan eva iti avocata

original: candrāpīḍas tu taṃ prāha naiva śraddhīyate maya /
analyzed: candrāpīḍaḥ tu tam prāha nā eva śraddhīyate maya

original: na vaiśampāyano jīvan muhūrtaṃ māṃ vimuñcati // AKad_6.55 //
analyzed: na vaiśampāyanaḥ jīvan muhūrtam mām vimuñcati

original: iti sambhrāntacittaṃ taṃ punar āha balāhakaḥ /
analyzed: iti sambhrānta cittam tam punar āha balāhakaḥ

original: śrūyatāṃ deva tadvṛttaṃ yathāsāv iha nāgataḥ // AKad_6.56 //
analyzed: śrūyatām deva tat vṛttam yathā asau iha na āgataḥ

original: deva tādṛśam ādiśya prasthitaṃ tvām anuvrajat /
analyzed: deva tādṛśam ādiśya prasthitam tvām anuvrajat

original: tataḥ pratinivṛtto 'sau tatraivāsta yathāsthiti // AKad_6.57 //
analyzed: tatas pratinivṛttaḥ sau tatra eva āsta yathāsthiti

original: aparedyur athotthāya vidhāya prakṛtāḥ kriyāḥ /
analyzed: aparedyus atha utthāya vidhāya prakṛtāḥ kriyāḥ

original: vinodayitum ātmānaṃ sa cacāra vanasthalīḥ // AKad_6.58 //
analyzed: vinodayitum ātmānam sa cacāra vana sthalīḥ

original: tatra sapratyabhijñānaṃ sthānaṃ sthānaṃ nirūpayan /
analyzed: tatra sa pratyabhijñānam sthānam sthānam nirūpayan

original: kiñcin naṣṭam ivānveṣṭum aicchad uttrastalocanaḥ // AKad_6.59 //
analyzed: kiñcid naṣṭam iva anveṣṭum aicchat uttrasta locanaḥ

original: tato 'stābhimukhe bhānāv asmābhiḥ so 'bhyadhīyata /
analyzed: tatas sta abhimukhe bhānau asmābhiḥ saḥ bhyadhīyata

original: sthīyatām adya śiṣṭās tu śvo draṣṭāsi vanasthalīḥ // AKad_6.60 //
analyzed: sthīyatām adya śiṣṭāḥ tu śvas draṣṭāsi vana sthalīḥ

original: athāsau vicarann eva sābhyasūyam ivāvadat /
analyzed: atha asau vicaran eva sa abhyasūyam iva avadat

original: yāta yūyaṃ na gantavyaṃ yāvajjīvam ito mayā // AKad_6.61 //

analyzed: tatra eva anīyata aneka māyā vaicitrya kāriṇā

analyzed: gamana utkalikām dadhre buddhau kādambarī tatas

analyzed: prādurbabhūva bālāyāḥ hṛdaya utkampa kāriṇī

analyzed: mahā śveta āśrama upāntam āpad astam gate ravau

original: udite ca niśānāthe saṃtaptakaruṇāhrade // AKad_7.11 //
analyzed: udite ca niśānāthe saṃtapta karuṇā hrade

analyzed: āsādya ca tam uddeśam karuṇam rodana dhvanim

original: vanāntakandarodbhūtapratiśabdam athāśṛṇot // AKad_7.12 //
analyzed: vanānta kandara udbhūta pratiśabdam atha aśṛṇot

original: manye saiva mahāśvetāvartmanīyam upasthitā /
analyzed: manye sā eva mahāśvetāvartmanīyam upasthitā

original: ity asau śaṅkamāneva viveśa drutam āśramam // AKad_7.13 //
analyzed: iti asau śaṅkamānā iva viveśa drutam āśramam

original: tataḥ praviśya sāpaśyat prāṇanāthaṃ tathāsthitam /
analyzed: tatas praviśya sā apaśyat prāṇanātham tathā āsthitam

original: mahāśvetāṃ ca tām ārtaninādaṃ rudatīṃ bhṛśam // AKad_7.14 //
analyzed: mahā śvetām ca tām ārta ninādam rudatīm bhṛśam

original: tāmudvīkṣya mahāśvetāṃ vikasacchokavihvalā /
analyzed: tām udvīkṣya mahā śvetām vikasat śoka vihvalā

original: nitāntatāḍitoraskaṃ rudatī moham āgamat // AKad_7.15 //
analyzed: nitānta tāḍita uraskam rudatī moham āgamat

original: patralekhāpi tadrūpacandrāpīḍavilokinī /
analyzed: patra lekhā api tad rūpa candrāpīḍa vilokinī

analyzed: mumoca sahasā prajñām nipatantī śilātake

original: kādambaryā tu dhairyeṇa pṛṣṭā taralikā tadā /
analyzed: kādambaryā tu dhairyeṇa pṛṣṭā taralikā tadā

original: ācacakṣe yathāvṛttaṃ sarvaṃ tanmaraṇakramam // AKad_7.17 //
analyzed: ācacakṣe yathāvṛttam sarvam tad maraṇa kramam

original: tad ākarṇya vihāyaiva vaiklavyaṃ strījanocitam /
analyzed: tat ākarṇya vihāya eva vaiklavyam strī jana ucitam

original: labdhasaṃjñāṃ mahāśvetāṃ madalekhāṃ ca sāvadat // AKad_7.18 //
analyzed: labdha saṃjñām mahā śvetām madalekhām ca sā avadat

original: saṃtatasthūladhāreṇa cirāt prabhṛti rohatā /
analyzed: saṃtata sthūla dhāreṇa cirāt prabhṛti rohatā

original: khinnāham adhunānena rodanena garīyasā // AKad_7.19 //
analyzed: khinnā aham adhunā anena rodanena garīyasā

analyzed: yathāyogyena gacchāmi na hi śaknomi roditum

original: sakhi me darśitaḥ panthā nāthenaiva mahātmanā // AKad_7.20 //
analyzed: sakhi me darśitaḥ panthāḥ nāthena eva mahātmanā

original: ayaṃ suhṛdviyogena nārodīdvilalāpa vā /
analyzed: ayam suhṛd viyogena nā arodīt vilalāpa vā

original: prāṇāneva priyānaujjhītsa panthāḥ kva gato mama // AKad_7.21 //
analyzed: prāṇān eva priyān aujjhīt sa panthāḥ kva gataḥ mama

original: yuktaṃ sakhi mahāśvete tava prāṇitum īdṛśam /
analyzed: yuktam sakhi mahā śvete tava prāṇitum īdṛśam

original: jīvitā devatābhis tvaṃ punas tatsaṃgamāśayā // AKad_7.22 //
analyzed: jīvitā devatābhiḥ tvam punar tad saṃgama āśayā

original: ahaṃ sarvaprakāraṃ tu vidhibhagnamanorathā /
analyzed: aham sarva prakāram tu vidhi bhagna manorathā

original: karomi durbhagaiḥ prāṇaiḥ kiṃ kalyāṇabahiṣkṛtā // AKad_7.23 //
analyzed: karomi durbhagaiḥ prāṇaiḥ kim kalyāṇa bahiṣkṛtā

original: madalekhe tathā kuryās tāto 'mbā ca kule sthitau /
analyzed: madalekhe tathā kuryāḥ tātaḥ mbā ca kule sthitau

analyzed: mad viyoga upatāpena yathā na dhṛtim ujjhataḥ

analyzed: svayam evā āsitavyam tu mad vāsa bhavane tvayā

original: yathā maṇigavākṣeṣu śerate noṇanābhayaḥ // AKad_7.25 //
analyzed: yathā maṇi gavākṣeṣu śerate na ūṇa nābhayaḥ

analyzed: kumāraḥ tatra citra sthaḥ mayā eva likhitaḥ svayam

original: rakṣaṇīyo yathā nāstam eti citrasthito 'py asau // AKad_7.26 //
analyzed: rakṣaṇīyaḥ yathā na astam eti citra sthitaḥ pi asau

original: śayanīyaśirobhāge ratnabhittiniveśitaḥ /
analyzed: śayanīya śiraḥ bhāge ratna bhitti niveśitaḥ

original: kāmadevapaṭaḥ kvāpi nikṣeptavyo vṛthārcitaḥ // AKad_7.27 //
analyzed: kāmadeva paṭaḥ kvāpi nikṣeptavyaḥ vṛthak arcitaḥ

original: krīḍāparvatako deyaḥ praśāntāya tapasvine /
analyzed: krīḍā parvatakaḥ deyaḥ praśāntāya tapasvine

original: tatroṣitaṃ kumāreṇa na hi so 'nyasya śobhate // AKad_7.28 //
analyzed: tatra uṣitam kumāreṇa na hi saḥ nyasya śobhate

original: dīrghikārāmamadhye me padminīkhaṇḍamaṇḍitā /
analyzed: dīrghikā ārāma madhye me padminī khaṇḍa maṇḍitā

original: tatrāste kṛtavāstavyaṃ rājahaṃsakadambakam // AKad_7.29 //
analyzed: tatra āste kṛta vāstavyam rājahaṃsa kadambakam

original: dhārāyantraiḥ prapūrṇā ca krīḍāvāpī tadantike /
analyzed: dhārāyantraiḥ prapūrṇā ca krīḍā vāpī tad antike

original: snehān mayā svayaṃ siktam asti līlāvanaṃ navam // AKad_7.30 //
analyzed: snehāt mayā svayam siktam asti līlā vanam navam

analyzed: tasmin kṛta nava udvāhā bakule mālatī mayā

original: muktaḥ kaṅkaṇako nāsyā mocanīyas tvayaiva saḥ // AKad_7.31 //
analyzed: muktaḥ kaṅkaṇakaḥ na asyāḥ mocanīyaḥ tvayā eva saḥ

original: mayā putrīkṛtaś cāsāv aśokatarubālakaḥ /
analyzed: mayā putrīkṛtaḥ ca asau aśoka taru bālakaḥ

original: vardhanīyaḥ svahastāmbusekaiḥ stanyapayonibhaiḥ // AKad_7.32 //
analyzed: vardhanīyaḥ sva hasta ambu sekaiḥ stanya payaḥ nibhaiḥ

original: gṛhe muhur apaśyantī mām asau capalekṣaṇā /
analyzed: gṛhe muhur a paśyantī mām asau capala īkṣaṇā

original: nūnaṃ hariṇikā cāste prāpayes tāṃ ca kānanam // AKad_7.33 //
analyzed: nūnam hariṇikā ca āste prāpayeḥ tām ca kānanam

original: śukaḥ sa parihāso me kālinī sā ca śārikā /
analyzed: śukaḥ sa parihāsaḥ me kālinī sā ca śārikā

original: yathā na kalahāyete tathā kuryāḥ pratikṣaṇam // AKad_7.34 //
analyzed: yathā na kalahāyete tathā kuryāḥ pratikṣaṇam

original: nityam eva madutsaṅgalālitā nakulāṅganā /
analyzed: nityam eva mad utsaṅga lālitā nakula aṅganā

original: svāṅke śāyayitavyāsau yathā yāti na dūrataḥ // AKad_7.35 //
analyzed: sva aṅke śāyayitavyā asau yathā yāti na dūratas

original: kiṃ kāryam athavā gehe cintayā dīrghayānayā /

original: sampādaya citām āśu prajvalajjātavedasam // AKad_7.36 //
analyzed: sampādaya citām āśu prajvalat jātavedasam

analyzed: keyūraka ciram kim mām ati dīnām avekṣase

original: uttiṣṭha cinu kāṣṭhāni samāhāra hutāśanam // AKad_7.37 //
analyzed: uttiṣṭha cinu kāṣṭhāni samāhāra hutāśanam

original: lāvaṇyāmbumayo dehaḥ kriyate katham agnisāt /
analyzed: lāvaṇya ambu mayaḥ dehaḥ kriyate katham agnisāt

original: kumāram amum ādāya patāmi varam ambhasi // AKad_7.38 //
analyzed: kumāram amum ādāya patāmi varam ambhasi

original: kumāre mitraduḥkhena tatkṣaṇojjhitajīvite /
analyzed: kumāre mitra duḥkhena tad kṣaṇa ujjhita jīvite

original: iyantam api jīvantī kālaṃ lajje 'ham ātmanā // AKad_7.39 //
analyzed: iyantam api jīvantī kālam lajje ham ātmanā

original: draṣṭavyāsi kadety evam abhidhāyaiva māṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: draṣṭavyā asi kadā iti evam abhidhāya eva mām gataḥ

original: seyaṃ cirayatīty evam adhunābhidadhīta saḥ // AKad_7.40 //
analyzed: sā iyam cirayati iti evam adhunā abhidadhīta saḥ

original: iti kādambarīṃ sadyo maraṇavyavasāyinīm /
analyzed: iti kādambarīm sadyas maraṇa vyavasāyinīm

original: śiśirajyotirālokya kampamāna ivābhavat // AKad_7.41 //
analyzed: śiśirajyotiḥ ālokya kampamānaḥ iva abhavat

original: yena dugdhābdhikallolaplāvyamāna ivābhavat /
analyzed: yena dugdha abdhi kallola plāvyamānaḥ iva abhavat

original: pravṛttadantavīṇaś ca sakalaḥ kanyakājanaḥ // AKad_7.42 //
analyzed: pravṛtta danta vīṇaḥ ca sakalaḥ kanyakā janaḥ

original: atha divyākṛtiḥ ko 'pi puruṣo gaganasthitaḥ /
analyzed: atha divya ākṛtiḥ kaḥ pi puruṣaḥ gagana sthitaḥ

original: garjadghanaghaṭādhīragambhīradhvanirabhyadhāt // AKad_7.43 //
analyzed: garjat ghana ghaṭa adhīra gambhīra dhvaniḥ abhyadhāt

original: tvaṃ hi vatse mahāśvete pūrvamāśvāsitā mayā /
analyzed: tvam hi vatse mahāśvete pūrvam āśvāsitā mayā

original: sthito madantike 'dyāpi puṇḍarīkastava priyaḥ // AKad_7.44 //
analyzed: sthitaḥ mad antike dyā api puṇḍarīkaḥ tava priyaḥ

original: candrāpīḍas tv ayaṃ kiñcitkālaṃ nidrāyamāṇavat /
analyzed: candrāpīḍaḥ tu ayam kiñcid kālam nidrāyamāṇa vat

original: atraivāvicalatkāntir āstāṃ kādambarīpriyaḥ // AKad_7.45 //
analyzed: atrā eva a vicalat kāntiḥ āstām kādambarī priyaḥ

original: anena hi punar labdhanirāpāyasthirāyuṣā /
analyzed: anena hi punar labdha nira apāya sthira āyuṣā

original: gāḍhakaṇṭhagrahānandaḥ kādambaryāḥ kariṣyate // AKad_7.46 //
analyzed: gāḍha kaṇṭhagraha ānandaḥ kādambaryāḥ kariṣyate

original: bhavatyor ayam evāstu cittasampratyayo dṛḍhaḥ /
analyzed: bhavatyoḥ ayam eva astu citta sampratyayaḥ dṛḍhaḥ

original: na sprakṣyati vikāro yad enaṃ bhūtasvabhāvajaḥ // AKad_7.47 //
analyzed: na sprakṣyati vikāraḥ yat enam bhūta svabhāva jaḥ

original: ity uktvā jyotiṣā tena sahasaiva tirodadhe /
analyzed: iti uktvā jyotiṣā tena sahasā eva tirodadhe

original: savismayas tadā cābhūd akhilaḥ kanyakājanaḥ // AKad_7.48 //
analyzed: sa vismayaḥ tadā ca abhūt akhilaḥ kanyakā janaḥ

original: pattralekhā ca tenaiva jyotiṣo vacanena sā /
analyzed: pattralekhā ca tena eva jyotiṣaḥ vacanena sā

original: labdhasaṃjñā samutthāya gatvā ca tvaritaiḥ padaiḥ // AKad_7.49 //
analyzed: labdha saṃjñā samutthāya gatvā ca tvaritaiḥ padaiḥ

original: tam indrāyudhanāmānam aśvam ādāya kesarāt /
analyzed: tam indrāyudha nāmānam aśvam ādāya kesarāt
