analyzed: tena eva sahitā agādham aviśat madhyam ambhasaḥ

original: śaṅkiteva ca tāṃ vegayātāṃ taralikānvagāt /
analyzed: śaṅkitā iva ca tām vega yātām taralikā anvagāt

original: sā dadarśa payomadhyād udgacchantaṃ kapiñjalam // AKad_7.51 //
analyzed: sā dadarśa payaḥ madhyāt udgacchantam kapiñjalam

original: prasṛtya vyācacakṣe ha yathālokitamadbhutam /
analyzed: prasṛtya vyācacakṣe ha yathā ālokitam adbhutam

original: tenāpi vismayastāsāṃ kanyānāṃ vavṛdhetarām // AKad_7.52 //
analyzed: tena api vismayaḥ tāsām kanyānām vavṛdhetarām

original: atha bibhraj jaṭās tanvīḥ srutāmbukaṇadanturāḥ /
analyzed: atha bibhrat jaṭāḥ tanvīḥ sruta ambu kaṇa danturāḥ

original: jalārdravalkalas tābhir adṛśyata kapiñjalaḥ // AKad_7.53 //
analyzed: jala ārdra valkalaḥ tābhiḥ adṛśyata kapiñjalaḥ

original: svayam evopasṛtyāsau mahāśvetām abhāṣata /
analyzed: svayam eva upasṛtya asau mahāśvetām abhāṣata

original: rājaputry api nāmāyaṃ pratyabhijñāyate janaḥ // AKad_7.54 //
analyzed: rāja putrī api nāma ayam pratyabhijñāyate janaḥ

original: ahaṃ kapiñjalas tasya vayasyo dayitasya te /
analyzed: aham kapiñjalaḥ tasya vayasyaḥ dayitasya te

original: cirāgamanadaurātmyād upālabhyo 'smi na tvayā // AKad_7.55 //
analyzed: cira āgamana daurātmyāt upālabhyaḥ smi na tvayā

original: kādambaryā tvayā caitāḥ śrutāś candramaso giraḥ /
analyzed: kādambaryā tvayā ca etāḥ śrutāḥ candramasaḥ giraḥ

original: madīyam api vṛttāntam adhunā śṛṇutaṃ yuvām // AKad_7.56 //
analyzed: madīyam api vṛttāntam adhunā śṛṇutam yuvām

original: apy utkṣipya tathā nīte vayasye tena tatkṣaṇam /
analyzed: api utkṣipya tathā nīte vayasye tena tad kṣaṇam

original: ahaṃ gaganam utplutya tam evānusarann agām // AKad_7.57 //
analyzed: aham gaganam utplutya tam eva anusaran agām

original: tato 'sau dūram utplutya praviśya śaśimaṇḍalam /
analyzed: tatas sau dūram utplutya praviśya śaśi maṇḍalam

original: paścād eva praviṣṭaṃ mām avalokyedam abravīt // AKad_7.58 //
analyzed: paścāt eva praviṣṭam mām avalokya idam abravīt

original: kapiñjala mṛgāṅkaṃ māṃ viddhi so 'haṃ tavāmunā /
analyzed: kapiñjala mṛgāṅkam mām viddhi saḥ ham tava amunā

original: vayasyena vṛthā śapto hemakūṭagate tvayi // AKad_7.59 //
analyzed: vayasyena vṛthā śaptaḥ hemakūṭa gate tvayi

original: voḍhavyā lokayātrā hi lokapālatayā mayā /
analyzed: voḍhavyā lokayātrā hi lokapāla tayā mayā

original: udito 'haṃ nije kāle tataḥ pravikiran karān // AKad_7.60 //
analyzed: uditaḥ ham nije kāle tatas pravikiran karān

original: ayaṃ madaṃśusaṃsparśapravṛddhādhikamanmathaḥ /
analyzed: ayam mad aṃśu saṃsparśa pravṛddha adhika manmathaḥ

original: kaṇṭopāntagalaprāṇo rūkṣaṃ māṃ vīkṣya śaptavān // AKad_7.61 //
analyzed: kaṇṭa upānta gala prāṇaḥ rūkṣam mām vīkṣya śaptavān

original: yathādya virahārto 'hametya vyāpāditas tvayā /
analyzed: yathā adya viraha ārtaḥ ham etya vyāpāditaḥ tvayā

original: mariṣyasi tathaiva tvamindo janmani janmani // AKad_7.62 //
analyzed: mariṣyasi tathā eva tvam indo janmani janmani

original: pratiśapto mayāpyeṣa tvam apy evaṃ mariṣyasi /
analyzed: pratiśaptaḥ mayā api eṣa tvam api evam mariṣyasi

original: madvad evety anāgaskaśāpatāpoditakrudhā // AKad_7.63 //
analyzed: madvat evā iti anāgaska śāpa tāpa udita krudhā

original: tataḥ pratanumanyor me paritāpa ivābhavat /
analyzed: tatas pratanumanyoḥ me paritāpaḥ iva abhavat

original: jāmātāyaṃ mahāśvetāsambandhād iti paśyataḥ // AKad_7.64 //
analyzed: jāmātā ayam mahāśvetā sambandhāt iti paśyataḥ

original: kuryādapi pratīkāraṃ śvetaketurmahātapāḥ /
analyzed: kuryāt api pratīkāram śvetaketuḥ mahā tapāḥ

original: śarīramasya rakṣāmi sāmṛtair aham aṃśubhiḥ // AKad_7.65 //
analyzed: śarīram asya rakṣāmi sa amṛtaiḥ aham aṃśubhiḥ

original: ity utkṣipya mayehāyam ānītas tvaṃ ca satvaram /
analyzed: iti utkṣipya mayā iha ayam ānītaḥ tvam ca sa tvaram

original: gatvā nivedayemaṃ tu vṛttāntaṃ śvetaketave // AKad_7.66 //
analyzed: gatvā nivedaya imam tu vṛttāntam śvetaketave

original: iti candramaso vākyaṃ śrutvāhaṃ divamutpatan /
analyzed: iti candramasaḥ vākyam śrutvā aham divam utpatan

original: tvaritaprasṛtaḥ kañcidvaimānikamalaṅghayam // AKad_7.67 //
analyzed: tvarita prasṛtaḥ kañcid vaimānikam alaṅghayam

original: sa ca mām aśapat kopād aśveneva tapobalāt /
analyzed: sa ca mām aśapat kopāt aśvena iva tapaḥ balāt

original: tvayāhaṃ laṅghitas tasmād aśva eva bhaviṣyasi // AKad_7.68 //
analyzed: tvayā aham laṅghitaḥ tasmāt aśvaḥ eva bhaviṣyasi

original: sa mayā praṇipatyoktaḥ suhṛc chokāndhacetasaḥ /
analyzed: sa mayā praṇipatya uktaḥ suhṛd śoka andha cetasaḥ

original: pramādān na tapodarpān mama tat saṃhara krudham // AKad_7.69 //
analyzed: pramādāt na tapaḥ darpāt mama tat saṃhara krudham

original: sa tv abhāṣata datto 'yaṃ śāpo bhavati nānyathā /
analyzed: sa tu abhāṣata dattaḥ yam śāpaḥ bhavati na anyathā

original: tārāpīḍasya putrārtham ujjayinyāṃ tapasyataḥ // AKad_7.70 //
analyzed: tārāpīḍasya putra artham ujjayinyām tapasyataḥ

original: rājño yāsyati putratvaṃ candramāḥ sanidarśanam /
analyzed: rājñaḥ yāsyati putra tvam candramāḥ sa nidarśanam

original: puṇḍarīkastadīyasya śukanāsasya mantriṇaḥ // AKad_7.71 //
analyzed: puṇḍarīkaḥ tadīyasya śukanāsasya mantriṇaḥ

original: tārāpīḍasutasyendorgantā vāhanatāṃ bhavān /
analyzed: tārāpīḍa sutasya indoḥ gantā vāhana tām bhavān

original: tasyāvasāne snātvaiva śāpasyānto bhaviṣyati // AKad_7.72 //
analyzed: tasya avasāne snātvā eva śāpasya antaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: tad ākarṇyārṇave tūrṇam apataṃ śāpamūrchitaḥ /
analyzed: tat ākarṇya arṇave tūrṇam apatam śāpa mūrchitaḥ

original: tato 'śvībhūta evāham udatiṣṭham ayonijaḥ // AKad_7.73 //
analyzed: śvībhūtaḥ eva aham udatiṣṭham ayonijaḥ

original: smṛtis turagabhāve 'pi na me naṣṭā kadācana /
analyzed: smṛtiḥ turaga bhāve na me naṣṭā kadācana

original: mamaivāyam ihānītaḥ kiṃnarānusṛtikramāt // AKad_7.74 //
analyzed: mama eva ayam iha ānītaḥ kiṃnara anusṛti kramāt

original: vīpsānvitaś ca śāpo 'yaṃ parasparam abhūt tayoḥ /
analyzed: vīpsā anvitaḥ ca śāpaḥ yam parasparam abhūt tayoḥ

original: dvitīyajanmayogena tayor bhāvyam ato dhruvam // AKad_7.75 //
analyzed: dvitīya janma yogena tayoḥ bhāvyam atas dhruvam

original: tad gacchāmi yathāvṛttam ākhyātuṃ śvetaketave /
analyzed: tat gacchāmi yathāvṛttam ākhyātum śvetaketave

original: dvitīyajanmagrahaṇaṃ kva tayoś ceti veditum // AKad_7.76 //
analyzed: dvitīya janma grahaṇam kva tayoḥ ca iti veditum

original: kapiñjalakathātas taṃ vaiśampāyanavigraham /
analyzed: kapiñjala kathātaḥ tam vaiśampāyana vigraham

original: puṇḍarīkaṃ parijñāya mahāśvetānvatapyata // AKad_7.77 //
analyzed: puṇḍarīkam parijñāya mahāśveta anvatapyata

original: dvitīye 'py aham evāsya jātā janmani mṛtyave /
analyzed: dvitīye pi aham eva asya jātā janmani mṛtyave

original: śapto madanurakto 'sau mayeti vilalāpa sā // AKad_7.78 //
analyzed: śaptaḥ mad anuraktaḥ sau mayā iti vilalāpa sā

original: kapiñjalas tadā tv evaṃ rudatīṃ tām avārayat /
analyzed: kapiñjalaḥ tadā tu evam rudatīm tām avārayat

original: abravīc cāvadhiḥ pūrṇaḥ prāyo duḥkhasya vartate // AKad_7.79 //
analyzed: abravīt ca avadhiḥ pūrṇaḥ prāyas duḥkhasya vartate

original: alpenaiva hi kālena puṇḍarīkasya sasmitam /
analyzed: alpena eva hi kālena puṇḍarīkasya sa smitam

original: akṣamālāṃ punaḥ pāṇipallave vinidhāsyasi // AKad_7.80 //
analyzed: akṣamālām punar pāṇipallave vinidhāsyasi

original: kādambary api mādhuryamugdhasmitasudhāñcitaiḥ /
analyzed: kādambarī api mādhurya mugdha smita sudhā āñcitaiḥ

original: pramodayiṣyate sāndraiś candrāpīḍasya bhāṣitaiḥ // AKad_7.81 //
analyzed: pramodayiṣyate sāndraiḥ candrāpīḍasya bhāṣitaiḥ

original: kādambarī tam aprākṣīd bhagavan sā kva vartate /
analyzed: kādambarī tam aprākṣīt bhagavan sā kva vartate

original: pattralekheti sa tv āha mayā nājñāyi tadgatiḥ // AKad_7.82 //
analyzed: pattralekhā iti sa tu āha mayā na ajñāyi tad gatiḥ

original: ity uktvodapatad vyoma romakūpāmbuvipruṣaḥ /
analyzed: iti uktvā udapatat vyoma romakūpa ambu vipruṣaḥ

original: acchodabindusaṃdigdhāḥ kirann atha kapiñjalaḥ // AKad_7.83 //
analyzed: accha uda bindu saṃdigdhāḥ kiran atha kapiñjalaḥ

original: tasmin gate mahāśvetākādambaryau tathaiva tām /
analyzed: tasmin gate mahāśvetā kādambaryau tathā eva tām

original: saśokavismayotkampe kathayā ninyatur niśām // AKad_7.84 //
analyzed: sa śoka vismaya utkampe kathayā ninyatuḥ niśām

original: mahāśvetākathāvṛtte tatrāpy adhikaniścayā /
analyzed: mahā śvetā kathā vṛtte tatra api adhika niścayā

original: kādambaryāḥ sthiraṃ citte sā pratyayam ajījanat // AKad_7.85 //
analyzed: kādambaryāḥ sthiram citte sā pratyayam ajījanat

original: aparedyur atha sphītasphaṭikopalavedikām /
analyzed: aparedyus atha sphīta sphaṭika upala vedikām

original: hṛdyām āropya karpūratuṣārakaṇadanturaiḥ // AKad_7.86 //
analyzed: hṛdyām āropya karpūra tuṣāra kaṇa danturaiḥ

original: abhiṣicya jalaiḥ svacchair anulipya ca candanaiḥ /
analyzed: abhiṣicya jalaiḥ svacchaiḥ anulipya ca candanaiḥ

original: ānarca candrāpīḍasya dehaṃ kādambarī ciram // AKad_7.87 //
analyzed: ānarca candrāpīḍasya deham kādambarī ciram

original: yadi satyo 'yam āśvāsaḥ sarvaṃ svastham athānyathā /
analyzed: yadi satyaḥ yam āśvāsaḥ sarvam svastham atha anyathā

original: kva gato me tadā mṛtyur ity antar niścikāya sā // AKad_7.88 //
analyzed: kva gataḥ me tadā mṛtyuḥ iti antar niścikāya sā

original: jagāda ca mahāśvetām idānīṃ nanu na trape /
analyzed: jagāda ca mahā śvetām idānīm nanu na trape

original: sakhīti vyāharantī tvāṃ duḥkhasabrahmacāriṇīm // AKad_7.89 //
analyzed: sakhi iti vyāharantī tvām duḥkha sabrahmacāriṇīm

original: vidhinā vidadhānena samānasukhaduḥkhatām /
analyzed: vidhinā vidadhānena samāna sukha duḥkha tām

original: āvayoś cirasaṃrūḍhaṃ sakhīprema na dūṣitam // AKad_7.90 //
analyzed: āvayoḥ cira saṃrūḍham sakhī prema na dūṣitam

original: tataḥ prabhṛti sā mūrtim arcayantyāsta tāpasī /
analyzed: tatas prabhṛti sā mūrtim arcayantī āsta tāpasī

original: candrāpīḍasya candrārdhacūḍasyeva divāniśam // AKad_7.91 //
analyzed: candrāpīḍasya candra ardhacūḍasya iva divāniśam

original: divaseṣv atha gacchatsu nirvikāraśarīratām /
analyzed: divaseṣu atha gacchatsu nirvikāra śarīra tām

original: candrāpīḍasya paśyantī sthirām āśāṃ babandha sā // AKad_7.92 //
analyzed: candrāpīḍasya paśyantī sthirām āśām babandha sā

original: tataḥ senānyamā hūya balāhakam abhāṣata /
analyzed: tatas senā nyamā hūya balāhakam abhāṣata

original: viditas tava sarvo 'rtho vṛttānto bahuvismayaḥ // AKad_7.93 //
analyzed: viditaḥ tava sarvaḥ rthaḥ vṛttāntaḥ bahu vismayaḥ

original: dehakāntyavināśena jātaḥ sampratyayaś ca naḥ /
analyzed: deha kānti avināśena jātaḥ sampratyayaḥ ca naḥ

original: arhasy ujjayinīṃ gantuṃ prabhor āśvāsakāraṇāt // AKad_7.94 //
analyzed: arhasi ujjayinīm gantum prabhoḥ āśvāsa kāraṇāt

original: so 'bravīd devi tatrānyaṃ prajñātaṃ prahiṇomy aham /
analyzed: saḥ bravīt devi tatra anyam prajñātam prahiṇomi aham

original: yuvarājam ihotsṛjya na gantuṃ svayam utsahe // AKad_7.95 //
analyzed: yuvarājam iha utsṛjya na gantum svayam utsahe

original: tatas tvaritako nāma rājño nikaṭasevakaḥ /
analyzed: tatas tvaritakaḥ nāma rājñaḥ nikaṭa sevakaḥ

original: prahitas tena lekhaś ca svahastalikhitākṣaraḥ // AKad_7.96 //
analyzed: prahitaḥ tena lekhaḥ ca sva hasta likhita akṣaraḥ

original: sa gatvojjayinīṃ prāpya sarvaṃ rājñe nyavedayat /
analyzed: sa gatvā ujjayinīm prāpya sarvam rājñe nyavedayat

original: rājā sāntaḥpurāmātyas tad aśrauṣīd yathākramam // AKad_7.97 //
analyzed: rājā sa antaḥpura amātyaḥ tat aśrauṣīt yathākramam

original: tatas tanayahṛdbhaṅgaśrutivyāmūḍhacetanaḥ /
analyzed: tatas tanaya hṛd bhaṅga śruti vyāmūḍha cetanaḥ

original: uttarasmiṃś ca vṛttānte na dṛḍhapratyayo 'bhavat // AKad_7.98 //
analyzed: uttarasmin ca vṛttānte na dṛḍha pratyayaḥ bhavat

original: śukanāsas tu taṃ prāha karmavaicitryavedinaḥ /
analyzed: śukanāsaḥ tu tam prāha karma vaicitrya vedinaḥ

original: śrutetihāsaśāstrasya deva ko 'tra tava bhramaḥ // AKad_7.99 //
analyzed: śruta itihāsa śāstrasya deva kaḥ tra tava bhramaḥ

original: devatānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca martyadehaparigrahaḥ /
analyzed: devatānām ṛṣīṇām ca martya deha parigrahaḥ

original: śrūyate hi purāṇeṣu smṛtāv api ca paṭhyate // AKad_7.100 //
analyzed: śrūyate hi purāṇeṣu smṛtau api ca paṭhyate

original: citrāś cātiśayāḥ puṃsām amānuṣajanocitāḥ /
analyzed: citrāḥ ca atiśayāḥ puṃsām amānuṣa jana ucitāḥ

original: kim apy alaukikaṃ bījam anumāpayituṃ kṣamāḥ // AKad_7.101 //
analyzed: kim api alaukikam bījam anumāpayitum kṣamāḥ

original: kumāraś ca guṇair indor atidūraṃ na bhidyate /
analyzed: kumāraḥ ca guṇaiḥ indoḥ ati dūram na bhidyate

original: sā kāntir ākṛtiḥ śaktiḥ kva dṛṣṭā cānyamānuṣe // AKad_7.102 //
analyzed: sā kāntiḥ ākṛtiḥ śaktiḥ kva dṛṣṭā ca anya mānuṣe

original: svapne devīmukhe dṛṣṭaś candramās tu viśaṃs tvayā /
analyzed: svapne devī mukhe dṛṣṭaḥ candramāḥ tu viśan tvayā

original: mayā ca puṇḍarīkāṅkā brāhmaṇī samadṛśyata // AKad_7.103 //
analyzed: mayā ca puṇḍarīkāṅkā brāhmaṇī samadṛśyata

original: śāpa eva tayor āsīd āvayos tu paro varaḥ /
analyzed: śāpaḥ eva tayoḥ āsīt āvayoḥ tu paraḥ varaḥ

original: devatāḥ putratāṃ yānti yadgṛhe martyadharmiṇām // AKad_7.104 //
analyzed: devatāḥ putra tām yānti yad gṛhe martya dharmiṇām

original: kapiñjalaḥ punas tādṛg aviluptagatir divi /
analyzed: kapiñjalaḥ punar tādṛś avilupta gatiḥ divi

original: ācakṣīta kathaṃ mithyā turago nu kva tādṛśaḥ // AKad_7.105 //
analyzed: ācakṣīta katham mithyā turagaḥ nu kva tādṛśaḥ

original: idaṃ kvānyatra dṛṣṭaṃ vā jīvitenojjhito 'pi yaḥ /
analyzed: idam kva anyatra dṛṣṭam vā jīvitena ujjhitaḥ pi yaḥ

original: pañcabhūtātmako dehaḥ sa yad eti na vikriyām // AKad_7.106 //
analyzed: pañcabhūta ātmakaḥ dehaḥ sa yat eti na vikriyām

original: brūyāttvaritako mithyā likhenmithyā balāhakaḥ /
analyzed: brūyāt tvaritakaḥ mithyā likhet mithyā balāhakaḥ

original: suparīkṣitabhṛtyasya neyaṃ śaṅkā tavocitā // AKad_7.107 //
analyzed: su parīkṣita bhṛtyasya nā iyam śaṅkā tava ucitā

original: vidadhatamasamollasatpramodaṃ jagad acirād avalokayiṣyasi tvam /
analyzed: vidadhat amasama ullasat pramodam jagat acirāt avalokayiṣyasi tvam

original: śaśinam iva vidhuntudena muktaṃ vyapagataśāpakadarthanaṃ kumāram // AKad_7.108 //
analyzed: śaśinam iva vidhuntudena muktam vyapagata śāpa kadarthanam kumāram

original: iti mantrivacāṃsi śṛṇvato 'pi svasutasnehavisaṃsthulasya rājñaḥ /
analyzed: iti mantri vacāṃsi śṛṇvataḥ pi sva suta snehavisaṃsthulasya rājñaḥ

original: na dhṛtiṃ pratipadyate sma ceto gamane ca vyavasāyam ālalambe // AKad_7.109 //
analyzed: na dhṛtim pratipadyate sma cetaḥ gamane ca vyavasāyam ālalambe

original: atha saha mahiṣībhir bāṣpapūrṇekṣaṇābhir nijasacivasameto 'gacchadacchodatīram /
analyzed: atha saha mahiṣībhiḥ bāṣpa pūrṇa īkṣaṇābhiḥ nija saciva sametaḥ gacchat acchoda tīram

original: śithilitasakalāsthaḥ pārthivas taṃ ca yāntaṃ janapadapuralokaḥ sarva evānvagacchat // AKad_7.110 //
analyzed: śithilita sakala āsthaḥ pārthivaḥ tam ca yāntam janapada pura lokaḥ sarvaḥ eva anvagacchat

original: tasmin gate 'tha vijanāpaṇavīthikāntā kāntārabhūr iva tadojjayinī babhūva /
analyzed: tasmin gate vijana āpaṇa vīthikā antā kāntāra bhūḥ iva tadā ujjayinī babhūva

original: yāte divaṃ sakalalokamanobhirāme rāme yathā hatasamṛddhir abhūd ayodhyā // AKad_7.111 //
analyzed: yāte divam sakala loka manaḥ abhirāme rāme yathā hata samṛddhiḥ abhūt ayodhyā

original: gatvā nṛpaḥ sutam avekṣya ciraṃ ruditvā tat tad vilapya saha tatra vilāsavatyā /
analyzed: gatvā nṛpaḥ sutam avekṣya ciram ruditvā tat tat vilapya saha tatra vilāsavatyā

original: utsṛjya rājyavibhavaṃ yativad vyadhatta tatraiva valkaladharaḥ sthitim adya tāvat // AKad_7.112 //
analyzed: utsṛjya rājya vibhavam yati vat vyadhatta tatra eva valkaladharaḥ sthitim adya tāvat

original: ity uktvā kṛtajṛmbhikaḥ kṣaṇam iva sthitvācacakṣe punar jābalir bhagavān aho bata rasād dīrghā kathā varṇitā /
analyzed: iti uktvā kṛta jṛmbhikaḥ kṣaṇam iva sthitvā ācacakṣe punar jābaliḥ bhagavān aho bata rasāt dīrghā kathā varṇitā

original: tadyo 'sau śukanāsasūnur anayā śapto mahāśvetayā vaiśampāyana eṣa so 'dya śukatāṃ tenāgataḥ karmaṇā // AKad_7.113 //
analyzed: tadyaḥ sau śukanāsa sūnuḥ anayā śaptaḥ mahā śvetayā vaiśampāyanaḥ eṣa saḥ dya śuka tām tena āgataḥ karmaṇā

original: api cāvinayena kopitaḥ śukanāso 'sya pitā yad abravīt /
analyzed: api ca avinayena kopitaḥ śukanāsaḥ sya pitā yat abravīt

original: śuka eva vṛthā sa pāṭhitaḥ phalitaṃ tac ca vaco 'dya śāpavat // AKad_7.114 //
analyzed: śukaḥ eva vṛthā sa pāṭhitaḥ phalitam tat ca vacaḥ śāpa vat

original: śrutvaitāṃ tu kathāṃ tapodhanagaṇaiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ punar vismitaiḥ ko hetur bhagavan yad asya madanas tāvān muner apy abhūt /
analyzed: śrutvā etām tu kathām tapodhana gaṇaiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ punar vismitaiḥ kaḥ hetuḥ bhagavan yat asya madanaḥ tāvān muneḥ api abhūt

original: jābāliḥ punar āha nanv abhihitaṃ strīvīryataḥ kevalād utpanno 'yam ato rajasvalatayā nārīsvabhāvo 'bhavat // AKad_7.115 //
analyzed: jābāliḥ punar āha nanu abhihitam strī vīryataḥ kevalāt utpannaḥ yam atas rajasvala tayā nārī svabhāvaḥ bhavat

original: viratavacasi tasminn etad uktvā maharṣau rajanir api samāptiṃ sā kathāvat prapede /
analyzed: virata vacasi tasmin etat uktvā mahā ṛṣau rajaniḥ api samāptim sā kathāvat prapede

original: tadanu munijanenākāri pūrvāhṇasaṃdhyāsamayasamuciteṣu dhyānakāryeṣu siddhiḥ // AKad_7.116 //
analyzed: tadanu muni janena akāri pūrvāhṇa saṃdhyā samaya samuciteṣu dhyāna kāryeṣu siddhiḥ

original: iti śrīvipaścidvarāgragaṇyācāryaśrībhaṭṭajayantasūnor abhinandasya kṛtau kādambarīkathāsāre saptamaḥ sargaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī vipaścit vara agragaṇya ācārya śrī bhaṭṭa jayanta sūnoḥ abhinandasya kṛtau kādambarī kathā sāre saptamaḥ sargaḥ

original: aṣṭamaḥ sargaḥ
analyzed: aṣṭamaḥ sargaḥ

original: atha māṃ śrutajābāliproktākhilakathākramam /
analyzed: atha mām śruta jābāli prokta akhila kathā kramam

original: aspṛśad bālabhāve 'pi prāgjanmacaritasmṛtiḥ // AKad_8.1 //
analyzed: aspṛśat bāla bhāve pi prāc janma carita smṛtiḥ

original: śvetaketusuto bhūtvā śukanāsasuto 'bhavam /
analyzed: śvetaketu sutaḥ bhūtvā śukanāsa sutaḥ bhavam

original: sa vaiśampāyano 'dyāhaṃ jātaḥ putraḥ patattriṇaḥ // AKad_8.2 //
analyzed: sa vaiśampāyanaḥ dyā aham jātaḥ putraḥ patattriṇaḥ

original: mama jātasmṛter vyaktā prāvartata sarasvatī /
analyzed: mama jāta smṛteḥ vyaktā prāvartata sarasvatī

original: svayaṃ prāgjanmavidyāś ca hṛdayaṃ pratipedire // AKad_8.3 //
analyzed: svayam prāc janma vidyāḥ ca hṛdayam pratipedire

original: yathaiva cānye saṃskārāḥ prāktanā mām upāgaman /
analyzed: yathā eva ca anye saṃskārāḥ prāktanāḥ mām upāgaman

original: mahāśvetānurāgo 'pi tathaiva samupāgamat // AKad_8.4 //
analyzed: mahāśveta anurāgaḥ tathā eva samupāgamat

original: athābhyadhikahārītasnehasaṃvardhitaḥ kramāt /
analyzed: atha abhyadhika hārīta sneha saṃvardhitaḥ kramāt

original: gaganākramaṇe śaktim avāpaṃ jātapakṣatiḥ // AKad_8.5 //
analyzed: gagana ākramaṇe śaktim avāpam jāta pakṣatiḥ

original: divaseṣv atha gacchatsu śanair ārūḍhayauvanaḥ /
analyzed: divaseṣu atha gacchatsu śanais ārūḍha yauvanaḥ

original: gantum aicchaṃ mahāśvetāśramaṃ taddarśanotsukaḥ // AKad_8.6 //
analyzed: gantum aiccham mahāśveta āśramam tad darśana utsukaḥ

original: acintayaṃ ca janmedaṃ vihagasyāpi yātu me /
analyzed: acintayam ca janma idam vihagasya api yātu me

original: mahāśvetāśramopānte tarukoṭaraśāyinaḥ // AKad_8.7 //
analyzed: mahāśveta āśrama upānte taru koṭara śāyinaḥ

original: ekadā tv atha jābāler āśramaṃ samupāgamat /
analyzed: ekadā tu atha jābāleḥ āśramam samupāgamat

original: tātājñayā suhṛtsnehaparādhīnaḥ kapiñjalaḥ // AKad_8.8 //
analyzed: tāta ājñayā suhṛd sneha para adhīnaḥ kapiñjalaḥ

original: sa ca papraccha hārītaṃ kva vaiśampāyanaḥ śukaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca papraccha hārītam kva vaiśampāyanaḥ śukaḥ

original: utpannapratyabhijño 'ham ayam asmīty avādiṣam // AKad_8.9 //
analyzed: utpanna pratyabhijñaḥ ham ayam asmi iti avādiṣam

original: tataś ciram arodīt sa svavakṣasi nidhāya mām /
analyzed: tatas ciram arodīt sa sva vakṣasi nidhāya mām

original: vayasyapuṇḍarīkasya dhig iyaṃ vartate daśā // AKad_8.10 //
analyzed: vayasya puṇḍarīkasya dhik iyam vartate daśā

original: mayāpi rudatokto 'sau kiṃ rodiṣi kapiñjala /
analyzed: mayā api rudatā uktaḥ sau kim rodiṣi kapiñjala

original: tvayāpi matkṛte dṛṣṭā sakhe kaṣṭatarā daśā // AKad_8.11 //
analyzed: tvayā api mad kṛte dṛṣṭā sakhe kaṣṭatarā daśā

original: kva heṣā kva japābhyāsaḥ kva paryāṇaṃ kva valkalam /
analyzed: kva heṣā kva japa abhyāsaḥ kva paryāṇam kva valkalam

original: kvopavītaṃ kva vā valgā kva muniḥ kva turaṅgamaḥ // AKad_8.12 //
analyzed: kva upavītam kva vā valgā kva muniḥ kva turaṅgamaḥ

original: tataḥ kṣaṇam iva sthitvā tātasaṃdeśam abravīt /
analyzed: tatas kṣaṇam iva sthitvā tāta saṃdeśam abravīt

original: kapiñjalaḥ samāsena punar gamanasatvaraḥ // AKad_8.13 //
analyzed: kapiñjalaḥ samāsena punar gamana satvaraḥ

original: tātas tvām ādideśaivaṃ vatsa doṣas tavātra kaḥ /
analyzed: tātaḥ tvām ādideśa evam vatsa doṣaḥ tava atra kaḥ

original: rajovikṛtayo yuktāḥ śuddhastrībījajanmanām // AKad_8.14 //
analyzed: rajaḥ vikṛtayaḥ yuktāḥ śuddha strī bīja janmanām

original: alpāyuṣaṃ viditvāpi jāte tvayi na yan mayā /
analyzed: alpa āyuṣam viditvā api jāte tvayi na yat mayā

original: kṛtā pratikriyā tatra tadālasyaṃ hi māmakam // AKad_8.15 //
analyzed: kṛtā pratikriyā tatra tad ālasyam hi māmakam

original: adyāyuṣkāmayāgas tu prastutaḥ sa samāpyate /
analyzed: adya āyuṣkāma yāgaḥ tu prastutaḥ sa samāpyate

original: na yāvad bhavatā tāvan na gantavyam itaḥ kvacit // AKad_8.16 //
analyzed: na yāvat bhavatā tāvat na gantavyam itas kvacid

original: ahaṃ tvadantike sthātum icchann api nivāritaḥ /
analyzed: aham tvad antike sthātum icchan api nivāritaḥ

original: tātena tatra karmaikadeśaleśāṅgatāṃ gataḥ // AKad_8.17 //
analyzed: tātena tatra karma eka deśa leśa aṅga tām gataḥ

original: ity ākhyāya pariṣvajya kriyābhyāvartanena mām /
analyzed: iti ākhyāya pariṣvajya kriyā abhyāvartanena mām

original: krameṇāmantrya sa munīn pratasthe divam utpatan // AKad_8.18 //
analyzed: krameṇa āmantrya sa munīn pratasthe divam utpatan

original: gṛhītatātādeśo 'pi kāle gacchaty ahaṃ balāt /
analyzed: kāle gacchati aham balāt

original: nīto vāritavāmena kāmena vaśam ātmanaḥ // AKad_8.19 //
analyzed: nītaḥ vārita vāmena kāmena vaśam ātmanaḥ

original: anubhūya ciraṃ tatra citrāḥ smarabibhīṣikāḥ /
analyzed: anubhūya ciram tatra citrāḥ

original: akārṣaṃ dhiyam utkrāntagurvājño gamanaṃ prati // AKad_8.20 //
analyzed: akārṣam dhiyam utkrānta guru ājñaḥ gamanam prati

original: ekadā tv āśramaṃ śūnyaṃ vīkṣya nirgatatāpasam /
analyzed: ekadā tu āśramam śūnyam vīkṣya nirgata tāpasam

original: ekākī sahasoḍḍīya prasthito 'smy uttarāṃ diśam // AKad_8.21 //
analyzed: ekākī sahasā uḍḍīya prasthitaḥ smi uttarām diśam

original: adūroḍḍīna evāham anabhyastādhvalaṅghanaḥ /
analyzed: a dūra uḍḍīnaḥ eva aham an abhyasta adhva laṅghanaḥ

original: krāntas tṛṣā ca klāntyā ca jalaṃ kvacid atarkayam // AKad_8.22 //
analyzed: krāntaḥ tṛṣā ca klāntyā ca jalam kvacid atarkayam

original: tataḥ kvāpi payaḥ pītvā kiñcid ādaśya cañcunā /
analyzed: tatas kvāpi payaḥ pītvā kiñcid ādaśya cañcunā

original: viśrāntaye 'viśaṃ śrāntas taroḥ kasyāpi koṭare // AKad_8.23 //
analyzed: viśrāntaye viśam śrāntaḥ taroḥ kasya api koṭare

original: kṣaṇaṃ tatra niṣaṇṇasya tadā me nidrayā manaḥ /
analyzed: kṣaṇam tatra niṣaṇṇasya tadā me nidrayā manaḥ

original: gāḍhayā pāśapaṅktyā ca śarīrakam agṛhyata // AKad_8.24 //
analyzed: gāḍhayā pāśa paṅktyā ca śarīrakam agṛhyata

original: atha suptotthito 'paśyam agrato nātidūragam /
analyzed: atha supta utthitaḥ paśyam agratas na ati dūra gam

original: kṛtārtham iva mātaṅgayuvānaṃ mama bandhanāt // AKad_8.25 //
analyzed: kṛtārtham iva mātaṅga yuvānam mama bandhanāt

original: ākṛtyā karmaṇā cāsya samarthyāpiśitārthitām /
analyzed: ākṛtyā karmaṇā ca asya samarthyā piśita arthi tām

original: prārthanāpeśalaṃ kiñcid ātmamokṣārtham abhyadhām // AKad_8.26 //
analyzed: prārthanā peśalam kiñcid ātma mokṣa artham abhyadhām

original: bhadra saumyākṛtis tvaṃ hi na māṃsārthīva dṛśyase /
analyzed: bhadra saumya ākṛtiḥ tvam hi na māṃsa arthī iva dṛśyase

original: na hi māṃsārthino yuktaṃ nidrāchedapratīkṣaṇam // AKad_8.27 //
analyzed: na hi māṃsa arthinaḥ yuktam nidrā cheda pratīkṣaṇam

original: tad unmuñcatu māṃ bhadraḥ sukhaṃ yāmi yathepsitam /
analyzed: tat unmuñcatu mām bhadraḥ sukham yāmi yathā īpsitam

original: mayā baddhena ko 'rthas te kā vimuktena vā kṣatiḥ // AKad_8.28 //
analyzed: mayā baddhena kaḥ rthaḥ te kā vimuktena vā kṣatiḥ

original: so 'bravīn na svatantreṇa gṛhīto 'si mayā śuka /
analyzed: saḥ bravīt na svatantreṇa gṛhītaḥ si mayā śuka

original: prathitas tvaṃ hi jālāber āśrame suciraṃ sthitaḥ // AKad_8.29 //
analyzed: prathitaḥ tvam hi jālābeḥ āśrame su ciram sthitaḥ

original: sa tvaṃ gato mama svāmiduhituḥ karṇagocaram /
analyzed: sa tvam gataḥ mama svāmi duhituḥ karṇa gocaram

original: tanniyogād gṛhīto 'si katham unmucyase mayā // AKad_8.30 //
analyzed: tad niyogāt gṛhītaḥ u si katham unmucyase mayā

original: punar ākhyām amuṃ saumya yuvāsi smaravedanām /
analyzed: punar ākhyām amum saumya yuvāsi smara vedanām

original: jānāsi na priyotkaṇṭhākṛṣṭaṃ māṃ roddhum arhasi // AKad_8.31 //
analyzed: jānāsi na priya utkaṇṭhā ākṛṣṭam mām roddhum arhasi

original: so 'bhāṣata na bhṛtyena taruṇenāpi śāsanam /
analyzed: saḥ bhāṣata na bhṛtyena taruṇena api śāsanam

original: svāmino 'laṅghanīyaṃ tat kathaṃ tvāṃ tyaktum utsahe // AKad_8.32 //
analyzed: svāminaḥ laṅghanīyam tat katham tvām tyaktum utsahe

original: avocaṃ punar apy enaṃ śāpāj jātismaro muniḥ /
analyzed: avocam punar api enam śāpāt jātismaraḥ muniḥ

original: śukībhūto 'smi māṃ muñca paraṃ puṇyam avāpsyasi // AKad_8.33 //
analyzed: śukībhūtaḥ smi mām muñca param puṇyam avāpsyasi

original: sa tvāha nāhaṃ jānāmi muniṃ gandharvameva vā /
analyzed: sa tu āha na aham jānāmi munim gandharvam eva vā

original: rākṣasaṃ vā piśācaṃ vā nīta evāsi pakvaṇam // AKad_8.34 //
analyzed: rākṣasam vā piśācam vā nītaḥ eva asi pakvaṇam

original: ity uktvādāya pāṇau mām anaiṣīt pakvaṇaṃ balāt /
analyzed: iti uktvā ādāya pāṇau mām anaiṣīt pakvaṇam balāt

original: prāveśayac ca caṇḍālakumārīveśma kaśmalam // AKad_8.35 //
analyzed: prāveśayat ca caṇḍāla kumārī veśma kaśmalam

original: dṛṣṭvā tadārdragomāṃsavasāsṛkpaṅkapicchalam /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tat ārdra go māṃsa vasā asṛj paṅka picchalam

original: procchalatkrimi matprāṇair utkrāntam iva durbhagaiḥ // AKad_8.36 //
analyzed: procchalat krimi mad prāṇaiḥ utkrāntam iva durbhagaiḥ

original: atha mātaṅgakanyāyai sa mām asyai nyavedayat /
analyzed: atha mātaṅga kanyāyai sa mām asyai nyavedayat

original: svāminy ayam ihānītaḥ sa vaiśampāyanaḥ śukaḥ // AKad_8.37 //
analyzed: svāmini ayam iha ānītaḥ sa vaiśampāyanaḥ śukaḥ

original: sākūtam iva māṃ vīkṣya snehabāṣpārdrayā dṛśā /
analyzed: sa ākūtam iva mām vīkṣya sneha bāṣpa ārdrayā dṛśā

original: kṣaṇaṃ vakṣasi dhṛtvaiṣā nyakṣipad baddhapañjare // AKad_8.38 //
analyzed: kṣaṇam vakṣasi dhṛtvā eṣā nyakṣipat baddha pañjare

original: tato 'timahatā cakre śokena hṛdi me padam /
analyzed: cakre śokena hṛdi me padam

original: munir bhūtvādya caṇḍālyā ahaṃ krīḍāśukaḥ sthitaḥ // AKad_8.39 //
analyzed: muniḥ bhūtvā adya caṇḍālyāḥ aham krīḍā śukaḥ sthitaḥ

original: vyaktāṃ vidadhatā vācaṃ jātiṃ smarayatā nijām /
analyzed: vyaktām vidadhatā vācam jātim smarayatā nijām

original: aho jābālinā divyadṛṣṭināpakṛtaṃ mama // AKad_8.40 //
analyzed: aho jābālinā divya dṛṣṭinā apakṛtam mama

original: aho bata mahat kaṣṭam aviṣahyam upasthitam /
analyzed: aho bata mahat kaṣṭam aviṣahyam upasthitam

original: brāhmaṇena mayā neyaḥ kālaś caṇḍālaveśmani // AKad_8.41 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇena mayā neyaḥ kālaḥ caṇḍāla veśmani

original: bhavatvanaśanenaiva tyajāmi hatajīvitam /
analyzed: bhavatu anaśanena eva tyajāmi hata jīvitam

original: tāḍyamāno 'pi nāśnāmi na vācaṃ visṛjāmi ca // AKad_8.42 //
analyzed: tāḍyamānaḥ na aśnāmi na vācam visṛjāmi ca

original: evamudvejitaiṣā māṃ hanyādvā yadi vā tyajet /
analyzed: evam udvejitā eṣā mām hanyāt vā yadi vā tyajet

original: bhavaty ubhayathāpy eṣa panthāḥ śreyaskaro mama // AKad_8.43 //
analyzed: bhavati ubhayathā api eṣa panthāḥ śreyaskaraḥ mama

original: ity upārūḍhasaṃkalpam upāhṛtaphalodakā /
analyzed: iti upārūḍha saṃkalpam upāhṛta phala udakā

original: eṣā caṇḍālakanyā mām ākhyan madhurayā girā // AKad_8.44 //
analyzed: eṣā caṇḍāla kanyā mām ākhyat madhurayā girā

original: phalāny aśāna pānīyam upayuṅkṣva kim īkṣase /
analyzed: phalāni aśāna pānīyam upayuṅkṣva kim īkṣase

original: bhagnamaunavrato 'py adya kiṃ maunam avalambase // AKad_8.45 //
analyzed: bhagna mauna vrataḥ api adya kim maunam avalambase

original: munir jātismaro 'si tvaṃ yadi ko 'pi tathāpi te /
analyzed: muniḥ jātismaraḥ si tvam yadi kaḥ tathā api te

original: tiryagjātyucitā prāṇavṛttir evādya saṃmatā // AKad_8.46 //
analyzed: tiryak jāti ucitā prāṇa vṛttiḥ eva adya saṃmatā

original: na tiryagadhikāraṃ hi śāstraṃ śāstravido viduḥ /
analyzed: na tiryak adhikāram hi śāstram śāstra vidaḥ viduḥ

original: tiraścāṃ kva ca saṃskārāś cauḍopanayanādayaḥ // AKad_8.47 //
analyzed: tiraścām kva ca saṃskārāḥ cauḍa upanayana ādayaḥ

original: bhakṣyābhakṣyavicārādi yadi cādya cikīrṣasi /
analyzed: bhakṣya abhakṣya vicāra ādi yadi ca adya cikīrṣasi

original: tat kim ucchiṣṭaśaucādi nāśrame 'py āśritaṃ tvayā // AKad_8.48 //
analyzed: tat kim ucchiṣṭa śauca ādi na āśrame pi āśritam tvayā

original: āpatkāle dvijātīnām apy anāśyaṃ na vidyate /
analyzed: āpad kāle dvijātīnām api anāśyam na vidyate

original: hastād asmākam ādatta viśvāmitraḥ śvajāghanīm // AKad_8.49 //
analyzed: hastāt asmākam ādatta viśvāmitraḥ śva jāghanīm

original: kṛtadvitropavāso 'pi jihāsur iva jīvitam /
analyzed: kṛta dvitra upavāsaḥ pi jihāsuḥ iva jīvitam

original: lakṣyase vatsa mā maivaṃ kṛthā bhuṅkṣva phalodakam // AKad_8.50 //
analyzed: lakṣyase vatsa mā mā evam kṛthāḥ bhuṅkṣva phala udakam

original: ity acaṇḍālasadṛśair vākyair astrījanocitaiḥ /
analyzed: iti a caṇḍāla sadṛśaiḥ vākyaiḥ a strī jana ucitaiḥ

original: tasyā vismayamāno 'haṃ ciram evam acintayam // AKad_8.51 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ vismayamānaḥ ham ciram evam acintayam

original: nūnam eṣā na caṇḍālī madvat kenāpi karmaṇā /
analyzed: nūnam eṣā na caṇḍālī madvat kena api karmaṇā

original: manye gatim imāṃ prāptā madarthenaiva vā punaḥ // AKad_8.52 //
analyzed: manye gatim imām prāptāḥ mad arthena eva vā punar

original: bibharty urasi māteva paśyati snigdhayā dṛśā /
analyzed: bibharti urasi mātā iva paśyati snigdhayā dṛśā

original: vakti caivam ato 'muṣyāḥ karomi vacanaṃ varam // AKad_8.53 //
analyzed: vakti ca evam atas muṣyāḥ karomi vacanam varam

original: iti matvāsṛjaṃ vācam abhavaṃ bhojanonmukhaḥ /
analyzed: iti matvā asṛjam vācam abhavam bhojana unmukhaḥ

original: abhojayac ca mām eṣā jananīva dine dine // AKad_8.54 //
analyzed: abhojayat ca mām eṣā jananī iva dine dine

original: tattvam asyāḥ parijñātum anvahaṃ prārthanāṃ vyadhām /
analyzed: tattvam asyāḥ parijñātum anvaham prārthanām vyadhām

original: na tv eṣā prārthyamānāpi nijaṃ rūpam adīdṛśat // AKad_8.55 //
analyzed: na tu eṣā prārthyamānā api nijam rūpam adīdṛśat

original: nityam āśaṅkamāno 'ham etāṃ kām api devatām /
analyzed: nityam āśaṅkamānaḥ ham etām kām api devatām

original: poṣyamāṇo 'nayā kālam anaiṣaṃ tatra pakvaṇe // AKad_8.56 //
analyzed: poṣyamāṇaḥ nayā kālam anaiṣam tatra pakvaṇe

original: ekadā ca triyāmānte parityakto 'smi nidrayā /
analyzed: ekadā ca tri yāma ante parityaktaḥ smi nidrayā

original: adrākṣaṃ pakvaṇaṃ sarvam āryaprāyajanāvṛtam // AKad_8.57 //
analyzed: adrākṣam pakvaṇam sarvam ārya prāya jana āvṛtam

original: ātmānaṃ ca navodārahemapañjaravarṇitam /
analyzed: ātmānam ca nava udāra hema pañjara varṇitam

original: kanyakām īdṛśīṃ caitāṃ dṛṣṭā devena yādṛśī // AKad_8.58 //
analyzed: kanyakām īdṛśīm ca etām dṛṣṭā devena yādṛśī

original: yugalakam
analyzed: yugalakam

original: tat ko 'haṃ kim ahaṃ tatra rakṣitaś ciram enayā /
analyzed: tat kaḥ ham kim aham tatra rakṣitaḥ ciram enayā

original: kasya hetor ihānīta iti rājan na vedmy aham // AKad_8.59 //
analyzed: kasya hetoḥ iha ānītaḥ iti rājan na vedmi aham

original: ity ākarṇya kathām etāṃ vaiśampāyanavarṇitām /
analyzed: iti ākarṇya kathām etām vaiśampāyana varṇitām

original: sa rājā śūdrakaḥ śayyāgṛhād aṅganam āgamat // AKad_8.60 //
analyzed: sa rājā śūdrakaḥ śayyā gṛhāt aṅganam āgamat

original: sasambhramaṃ ca nirgatya tūrṇam ānāyayat punaḥ /
analyzed: sa sambhramam ca nirgatya tūrṇam ānāyayat punar

original: āsthānāvasare dṛṣṭāṃ tāṃ mātaṅgakumārikām // AKad_8.61 //
analyzed: āsthāna avasare dṛṣṭām tām mātaṅga kumārikām

original: atha sā praviśya vitatena tejasā dadatīva dikṣu śaradinducandrikām /
analyzed: atha sā praviśya vitatena tejasā dadatī iva dikṣu śarad indu candrikām

original: jitāraveṇuravabhinnavallakīdhvaninā svareṇa gadituṃ pracakrame // AKad_8.62 //
analyzed: jita āra veṇuḥ avabhinna vallakī dhvaninā svareṇa gaditum pracakrame

original: he rohiṇīramaṇa sarvakalāniketa tārāpate rajaninātha sudhānidhāna /
analyzed: he rohiṇīramaṇa sarva kalā niketa tārāpate rajaninātha sudhā nidhāna

original: kādambarīrasaguṇeṣu nibaddhabhāvam ātmānam arpitaśarīram anusmarendoḥ // AKad_8.63 //
analyzed: kādambarī rasa guṇeṣu nibaddha bhāvam ātmānam arpita śarīram anusmara indoḥ

original: māṃ ca viddhi śaśaketana śriyaṃ sāham asya jananī durātmanaḥ /
analyzed: mām ca viddhi śaśaketana śriyam sā aham asya jananī durātmanaḥ

original: pūrvaceṣṭitam avaitv ato bhavān ity amuṃ tava samīpam ānayam // AKad_8.64 //
analyzed: pūrva ceṣṭitam avaitu atas bhavān iti amum tava samīpam ānayam

original: ayam api guruśāsanāṃ vilaṅghya smaraparatantramanāḥ prayātukāmaḥ /
analyzed: ayam api guru śāsanām vilaṅghya smara paratantra manāḥ prayātu kāmaḥ

original: avinayapariśaṅkinā tadānīm avikalayogadṛśā vyaloki pitrā // AKad_8.65 //
analyzed: a vinaya pariśaṅkinā tadānīm avikala yoga dṛśā vyaloki pitrā

original: tasyājñayaivam anubhāvayituṃ vipākam āsannam eva guruśāsanalaṅghanasya /
analyzed: tasya ājñayā evam anubhāvayitum vipākam āsannam eva guru śāsana laṅghanasya

original: atrāvatīrya vipine janasaṅgabhītyā mātaṅgabhaṅgim avalambya tathā sthitāsmi // AKad_8.66 //
analyzed: atrā avatīrya vipine jana saṅga bhītyā mātaṅga bhaṅgim avalambya tathā sthitā asmi

original: gacchantam enaṃ viniyamya pāśais tīvrāṇi duḥkhāny anubhāvayantī /
analyzed: gacchantam enam viniyamya pāśaiḥ tīvrāṇi duḥkhāni anubhāvayantī

original: śāpāvasānaṃ yuvayoḥ kratoś ca samāptim āsaṃ ciram īkṣamāṇā // AKad_8.67 //
analyzed: śāpa avasānam yuvayoḥ kratoḥ ca samāptim āsam ciram īkṣamāṇā

original: muner avabhṛthāvadhiḥ pitur amuṣya siddhaḥ kratuḥ kṛtas tvam api saṃsmṛtasvatanur adya tacchāsanāt /
analyzed: muneḥ avabhṛtha avadhiḥ pituḥ amuṣya siddhaḥ kratuḥ kṛtaḥ tvam api saṃsmṛta sva tanuḥ adya tad śāsanāt

original: tadujjhitamalīmasedṛśaśarīrayogau yuvāṃ nijena vapuṣādhunānubhavatāṃ priyāsaṃgamam // AKad_8.68 //
analyzed: tad ujjhita malīmasa īdṛśa śarīra yogau yuvām nijena vapuṣā adhunā anubhavatām priyā saṃgamam

original: ity uktvoccair gamanarabhasapraślathībhūtabandhasragvisrastaiḥ kusumavidalair arcayitveva pṛthvīm /
analyzed: iti uktvā uccais gamana rabhasa praślathībhūta bandha sraj visrastaiḥ kusuma vidalaiḥ arcayitvā iva pṛthvīm

original: dikcakraṃ ca pracalaraśanānūpurotthair ninādair āmantryeva drutam udapatad dyām asau divyakāntiḥ // AKad_8.69 //
analyzed: diś cakram ca pracala raśanā nūpura utthaiḥ ninādaiḥ āmantrya iva drutam udapatat dyām asau divya kāntiḥ

original: svatanukāntitiraskṛtacandrikāṃ gaganam utpatitām avalokya tām /
analyzed: sva tanu kānti tiraskṛta candrikām gaganam utpatitām avalokya tām

original: suciram ūrdhvaniveśitalocanaḥ kam api vismayam āpa jano 'khilaḥ // AKad_8.70 //
analyzed: su ciram ūrdhva niveśita locanaḥ kam api vismayam āpa jano khilaḥ

original: athāsya rājño hṛdi śūdrakasya nirastadhairyādiguṇaprabandhaḥ /
analyzed: atha asya rājñaḥ hṛdi śūdrakasya nirasta dhairya ādi guṇa prabandhaḥ

original: kādambarīsaṃsmaraṇānubandhalabdhāvakāśo madano jajṛmbhe // AKad_8.71 //
analyzed: kādambarī saṃsmaraṇa anubandha labdha avakāśaḥ madanaḥ jajṛmbhe

original: na rājalakṣmīṃ bahu manyate sma norvīṃ na kīrtīṃ na sarasvatīṃ ca /
analyzed: na rāja lakṣmīm bahu manyate sma na urvīm na kīrtīm na sarasvatīm ca

original: sa tadrasakṣība ivālalambe kādambarīm eva nitāntam antaḥ // AKad_8.72 //
analyzed: sa tad rasa kṣībaḥ iva ālalambe kādambarīm eva nitāntam antar

original: parāṅmukhaḥ sparśaraseṣv ajasraṃ nādatta karṇau madhure 'pi sa dhvanau /
analyzed: parāṅmukhaḥ sparśa raseṣu ajasram na adatta karṇau madhure sa dhvanau

original: jagāma nirlakṣyaniviṣṭalocanaḥ krameṇa sarvendriyavṛttiśūnyatām // AKad_8.73 //
analyzed: jagāma nirlakṣya niviṣṭa locanaḥ krameṇa sarva indriya vṛtti śūnyatām

original: na guror upadeśam agrahīd bubudhe vastu tato na mūḍhadhīḥ /
analyzed: na guroḥ upadeśam agrahīt bubudhe vastu tatas na mūḍha dhīḥ

original: yatate sma na tasya siddhaye na parispanditum apy apārayat // AKad_8.74 //
analyzed: yatate sma na tasya siddhaye na parispanditum api apārayat

original: bhūtābhibhūta iva mūḍha iva krameṇa niḥsaṃjñatāṃ virahavedanayopanītaḥ /
analyzed: bhūta abhibhūtaḥ iva mūḍhaḥ iva krameṇa niḥsaṃjña tām viraha vedanayā upanītaḥ

original: muktvā manobhavarujaṃ suciraṃ sa rājā prāṇān mumoca sahasaiva vihaṅgamo 'pi // AKad_8.75 //
analyzed: muktvā manobhava rujam su ciram sa rājā prāṇān mumoca sahasā eva

original: jīvātmakaṃ cāndramasaṃ ca tejaḥ kṛtāspadaṃ tasya tanau yadāsīt /
analyzed: jīva ātmakam cāndramasam ca tejaḥ kṛta āspadam tasya tanau yadā āsīt

original: tad eva saṃkrānamathānyadehe citrā hi viśvaprakṛter vikārāḥ // AKad_8.76 //
analyzed: tat eva saṃkrānam atha anya dehe citrāḥ hi viśva prakṛteḥ vikārāḥ

original: atrāntare citrarathātmajāyās tanuṃ priyasyānvaham arcayantyāḥ /
analyzed: atrā antare citraratha ātmajāyāḥ tanum priyasya anvaham arcayantyāḥ

original: tathaiva kālaḥ sumahānagacchad āchodatīre tapasi sthitāyāḥ // AKad_8.77 //
analyzed: tathā eva kālaḥ su mahān agacchat āchoda tīre tapasi sthitāyāḥ

original: atha madhusamaye vijṛmbhite sā madanamahotsavavāsare sarāgam /
analyzed: atha madhu samaye vijṛmbhite sā madana mahā utsava vāsare sa rāgam

original: malayajaghanasārahārapuṣpais tanum atimātram alañcakāra bhartuḥ // AKad_8.78 //
analyzed: malaya jaghana sāra hāra puṣpaiḥ tanum atimātram alañcakāra bhartuḥ

original: taṃ vīkṣya tāpasadṛśāpi tadā jagāma kāmasya gocaram asau madhujṛmbhitasya /
analyzed: tam vīkṣya tāpasa dṛśā api tadā jagāma kāmasya gocaram asau madhu jṛmbhitasya

original: ekākinī sapad dikṣu nidhāya cakṣuḥ kāntaṃ svapantam iva nirbharamāliliṅga // AKad_8.79 //
analyzed: ekākinī sapat dikṣu nidhāya cakṣuḥ kāntam svapantam iva nirbharam āliliṅga

original: candrāpīḍaṃ sā ca jagrāha gāḍhaṃ kaṇṭhasthāne jīvitaṃ ca prapede /
analyzed: candrāpīḍam sā ca jagrāha gāḍham kaṇṭha sthāne jīvitam ca prapede

original: tenāpūrvāṃ sā samullāsalakṣmīm induspṛṣṭā sindhuveleva bheje // AKad_8.80 //
analyzed: tena apūrvām sā samullāsa lakṣmīm indu spṛṣṭā sindhu velā iva bheje

original: śilāśayyāṃ tyaktvā tadanu cirasuptotthita iva kṣaṇaṃ sthitvā jṛmbhālasavadanam unmīlya nayane /
analyzed: śilā śayyām tyaktvā tadanu cira supta utthitaḥ iva kṣaṇam sthitvā jṛmbhā alasa vadanam unmīlya nayane

original: tataś candrāpīḍaḥ prahatamurajadhvānapaṭunā svareṇa svenaiva smitamadhuram āha priyatamām // AKad_8.81 //
analyzed: tatas candrāpīḍaḥ prahata muraja dhvāna paṭunā svareṇa svena eva smita madhuram āha priyatamām

original: tvagamṛtaprabhave 'psarasāṃ kule sutanu janma samarthitavaty asi /
analyzed: tvac amṛta prabhave psarasām kule su tanu janma asi

original: yad amunā parirambhalavena te sapadi jīvitam āpad ayaṃ janaḥ // AKad_8.82 //
analyzed: yat amunā parirambha lavena te sapadi jīvitam āpat ayam janaḥ

original: mām anvabībhavad imām iyatīm avasthāṃ śāpaḥ kalaṅka iva kāntiharo dvitīyaḥ /
analyzed: mām anvabībhavat imām iyatīm avasthām śāpaḥ kalaṅkaḥ iva kānti haraḥ dvitīyaḥ

original: tvadviprayogakṛta eva babhūva tāpas tanvaṅgi śūdrakatanor api mṛtyave me // AKad_8.83 //
analyzed: tvad viprayoga kṛtaḥ eva babhūva tāpaḥ tanu aṅgi śūdraka tanoḥ api mṛtyave me

original: saṃrakṣitā tanur iyaṃ tu tava priyeti śāpaḥ kṛśodari virāmam avāpa pāpaḥ /
analyzed: saṃrakṣitā tanuḥ iyam tu tava priyā iti śāpaḥ kṛśa udari virāmam avāpa pāpaḥ

original: adyaprabhṛty akhilam eva hi candralokaṃ śādhi svapādakṛtamudram imaṃ ca lokam // AKad_8.84 //
analyzed: adya prabhṛti akhilam eva hi candra lokam śādhi sva pāda kṛta mudram imam ca lokam

original: sakhyāḥ priyaṃ pitṛtapobhir avāptadivyajīvaṃ kapiñjalakarārpitapāṇipadmam /
analyzed: sakhyāḥ priyam pitṛ tapobhiḥ avāpta divya jīvam kapiñjala kara arpita pāṇi padmam

original: manmaṇḍalād avatarantam akhaṇḍakāntim āpāṇḍugaṇḍam avalokaya puṇḍarīkam // AKad_8.85 //
analyzed: mad maṇḍalāt avatarantam akhaṇḍa kāntim āpāṇḍu gaṇḍam avalokaya puṇḍarīkam

original: kautūhalāt saha mayaiva gatendulokam ālokayiṣyasi kadācana pattralekhām /
analyzed: kautūhalāt saha mayā eva gata indu lokam ālokayiṣyasi kadācana pattralekhām

original: kāpi priye sahacarī mama sā tatastyā mā te 'dya bhūt tadanavāptikṛto viṣādaḥ // AKad_8.86 //
analyzed: kā api priye sahacarī mama sā tatas tyā mā te bhūt tad anavāpti kṛtaḥ viṣādaḥ

original: śrutveti tasya giram utsukatāṃ gatāsau romāñcakañcukamakṛtrimam udvahantī /
analyzed: śrutvā iti tasya giram utsuka tām gatā asau romāñca kañcukam akṛtrimam udvahantī

original: kādambarī caraṇayor nipapāta patyur ānandabāṣpakaṇaśīkaritekṣaṇaśrīḥ // AKad_8.87 //
analyzed: kādambarī caraṇayoḥ nipapāta patyuḥ ānanda bāṣpa kaṇa śīkarita īkṣaṇa śrīḥ

original: utthāya tvaritopasṛtya ca mahāśvetāṃ pariṣvajya sā pratyakṣīkṛtapuṇḍarīkapadavīṃ kṛtvā ca labdhotsavām /
analyzed: utthāya tvaritā upasṛtya ca mahāśvetām pariṣvajya sā pratyakṣīkṛta puṇḍarīka padavīm kṛtvā ca labdha utsavām

original: diṣṭyā vardhayituṃ nyayuṅkta rabhasenāhūya keyūrakaṃ tārāpīḍatapovane parijanaṃ pitror gṛhe cāparam // AKad_8.88 //
analyzed: diṣṭyā vardhayitum nyayuṅkta rabhasena āhūya keyūrakam tārāpīḍa tapovane parijanam pitroḥ gṛhe ca aparam

original: tārāpīḍaḥ kṛśapariṇato 'py āyayau tatra tūrṇasānandāntaḥpuraparijanāmātyavargānuyātaḥ /
analyzed: tārāpīḍaḥ kṛśa pariṇataḥ pi āyayau tatra tūrṇa sa ānanda antaḥpura parijana amātya varga anuyātaḥ

original: tasmin kāle sakhisahacaraḥ puṇḍarīko 'pi nākāt kiñcillajjāvanatavadano vallabhāṃ svām upetaḥ // AKad_8.89 //
analyzed: tasmin kāle sakhi sahacaraḥ puṇḍarīkaḥ pi nākāt kiñcid lajjā avanata vadanaḥ vallabhām svām upetaḥ

original: candrāpīḍaḥ svām api jānann atha mūrtiṃ tārāpīḍaṃ putravad eva praṇanāma /
analyzed: candrāpīḍaḥ svām api jānan atha mūrtim tārāpīḍam putra vat eva praṇanāma

original: tadvat taṃ ca praśrayaśīlaḥ śukanāsaṃ dattānando 'vandata sarvāś ca janitrīḥ // AKad_8.90 //
analyzed: tadvat tam ca praśraya śīlaḥ śukanāsam datta ānandaḥ vandata sarvāḥ ca janitrīḥ

original: māyā dhātur iyaṃ bhaved bhagavataḥ kiṃ śvetaketor idaṃ sāmarthyaṃ tapasām athendumahasām atrendrajālāyitam /
analyzed: māyā dhātuḥ iyam bhavet bhagavataḥ kim śvetaketoḥ idam sāmarthyam tapasām atha indu mahasām atra indrajālāyitam

original: vaiśampāyana ity avedi yad asāv eko 'pi tadbandhubhir yac cāsau sa tu puṇḍarīka iti te tasmin bhave saṃsthitāḥ // AKad_8.91 //
analyzed: vaiśampāyanaḥ iti avedi yat asau tad bandhubhiḥ yat ca asau sa tu puṇḍarīkaḥ iti te tasmin bhave saṃsthitāḥ

original: sa puṇḍarīko munir apy apaśyad ātmānam antaḥ śukanāsaputram /
analyzed: sa puṇḍarīkaḥ muniḥ api apaśyat ātmānam antar śukanāsa putram

original: praṇamya bhūmau pitaraṃ krameṇa manoramādyā jananīr vavande // AKad_8.92 //
analyzed: praṇamya bhūmau pitaram krameṇa manorama ādyāḥ jananīḥ vavande

original: atha vilāsavatī samanoramā stanayugasrutadugdhakaṇāvaliḥ /
analyzed: atha vilāsavatī sa manoramā stana yuga sruta dugdha kaṇā āvaliḥ

original: sutavapuḥparirambhamahotsavaṃ phalitasarvamanoratham anvabhūt // AKad_8.93 //
analyzed: suta vapuḥ parirambha mahā utsavam phalita sarva manoratham anvabhūt

original: tārāpīḍas tu pādānatam anavarataprasrutānandabāṣpaś candrāpīḍaṃ bhujābhyāṃ katham api sahasotthāpya kaṇṭhe gṛhītvā /
analyzed: tārāpīḍaḥ tu pāda ānatam anavarata prasruta ānanda bāṣpaḥ candrāpīḍam bhujābhyām katham api sahasā utthāpya kaṇṭhe gṛhītvā

original: śāpenātrāvatīrṇo yadi tad api bhavān uttamo lokapālaḥ prakhyāpyeti pratīpaṃ praṇatatanur asāv asya pādau vavande // AKad_8.94 //
analyzed: śāpena atrā avatīrṇaḥ yadi tat api bhavān uttamaḥ lokapālaḥ prakhyāpya iti pratīpam praṇata tanuḥ asau asya pādau vavande

original: tasmai nivedya nṛpacakram anicchate 'pi yatnāt kramopanatayā saha rājalakṣmyā /
analyzed: tasmai nivedya nṛpa cakram an icchate yatnāt krama upanatayā saha rāja lakṣmyā

original: nojjhāñcakāra cirasaṃcitam āśramaṃ sat tatprārthito 'pi mahiṣīsahitaś caturtham // AKad_8.95 //
analyzed: na ujjhāñcakāra cira saṃcitam āśramam sat tad prārthitaḥ mahiṣī sahitaḥ caturtham

original: ājagmus tatra valgatturagakhurapuṭoddhūtadhūlīkaḍāraiś cūḍāpratyuptabhāsvanmaṇiruciruciraiḥ śobhamānāḥ śirobhiḥ /
analyzed: ājagmuḥ tatra valgat turaga khura puṭa uddhūta dhūlī kaḍāraiḥ cūḍā pratyupta bhāsvat maṇi ruci ruciraiḥ śobhamānāḥ śirobhiḥ

original: candrāpīḍendusaṃdarśanarabhasasamutphullalolekṣaṇābjā nirvyājautsukyasajjīkṛtaniratiśayopāyanāḥ pārthivendrāḥ // AKad_8.96 //
analyzed: candrāpīḍa indu saṃdarśana rabhasa samutphulla lola īkṣaṇa abjāḥ nirvyāja autsukya sajjīkṛta niratiśaya upāyanāḥ pārthiva indrāḥ

original: saṃkalpādhikalābhaharṣarabhasojjṛmbhāvilolībhavadgandharvapramadākadambakṛtakrīḍākarāsphālanām /
analyzed: saṃkalpa adhika lābha harṣa rabhasa ujjṛmbhā vilolībhavat gandharva pramadā kadamba kṛta krīḍā kara āsphālanām

original: sārdhaṃ citrarathas tato madirayā haṃsaś ca gauryā saha draṣṭuṃ nṛttamayīm iva vyavasitām ājagmatur medinīm // AKad_8.97 //
analyzed: sārdham citrarathaḥ tatas madirayā haṃsaḥ ca gauryā saha draṣṭum nṛtta mayīm iva vyavasitām ājagmatuḥ medinīm

original: tābhyām etya nirasya tāpasatanucchāyāṃ duhitroḥ kṛte bhāsvatkautukamaṅgale navavadhūveṣe manohāriṇi /
analyzed: tābhyām etya nirasya tāpasa tanucchāyām duhitroḥ kṛte bhāsvat kautukamaṅgale nava vadhū veṣe manohāriṇi

original: nirvṛtte ca samantrahomasubhagārambhe vivāhotsave tatrānyonyasamāgamapramuditāḥ sarve mudaṃ lebhire // AKad_8.98 //
analyzed: nirvṛtte ca sa mantra homa subhaga ārambhe vivāha utsave tatra anyonya samāgama pramuditāḥ sarve mudam lebhire

original: iti vitatavilāsaḥ puṇḍarīkeṇa sākaṃ divi bhuvi ca vicitrodyānalīlāvihāraḥ /
analyzed: iti vitata vilāsaḥ puṇḍarīkeṇa sākam divi bhuvi ca vicitra udyāna līlā vihāraḥ

original: abhimataphalasampadvardhamānābhinandaḥ śriyam abhajata candrāpīḍamūrtir mṛgāṅkaḥ // AKad_8.99 //
analyzed: abhimata phala sampad vardhamāna abhinandaḥ śriyam abhajata candrāpīḍa mūrtiḥ mṛgāṅkaḥ

original: iti śrīsakalavipaściccakravartiśrībhaṭṭajayantasūnor abhinandasya kṛtau kādambarīkathāsāre 'ṣṭamaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī sakala vipaścit cakravarti śrī bhaṭṭa jayanta sūnoḥ abhinandasya kṛtau kādambarī kathā sāre ṣṭamaḥ sargaḥ
